K12D0494_H0462:220b-15: kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la

K12D0494_H0462:222a-11: rang gi bslab pa la gnas pa //

K12D0494_H0462:222b-16: gsang sngags kyis sgyu ma rnams ston to //

K12D0494_H0462:222b-36: / dus gsum las 'das pa'i phyir dang /

K12D0494_H0462:223a-16: rnams las chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi stobs /

K12D0494_H0462:223a-25: de dag byung ma thag tu de nas yang chos

K12D0494_H0462:228a-2: gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan byas te //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-3: sngags pas der gnas rdzogs pa yi //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-4: sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo bsam //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-5: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-6: bdag gi de nyid yin par gsungs //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-7: nam zhig sngags pas bdag gis ni //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-8: de nyid dogs pa med 'gyur ba //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-9: de tshe 'jig rten thams cad la //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-10: phan pa byed pa nyid du 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-11: ngo mtshar sna tshogs ngag dang ldan //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-13: sngags pa nam zhig mnyam bzhag na //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-14: srid pa rab tu dogs pa na //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-15: thog med dus nas mi shes pas //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-16: bsags ba'i las de kun zad 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-17: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-18: sems de nam zhig sgom byed pa //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-19: de'i tshe'ang sngags pa rnal 'byor pa //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-20: chu yis padma lta bur ni //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-22: las kyi rtog pas mi gos na //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-23: 'di bdag nyid ni rgyal mchog tu //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-24: bsgyur na smos kyang ci zhig dgos //
K12D0494_H0462:228a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bdud
K12D0494_H0462:228a-27: bzhi las rgyal ba rdo rje rnam par rol pa
K12D0494_H0462:228a-28: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
K12D0494_H0462:228a-29: nas rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig bdud bzhi las rgyal
K12D0494_H0462:228a-30: bar byed pa / rgyud drug las rnam par grol bar byed pa /
K12D0494_H0462:228a-31: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di rnams gsungs so //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-0: na ma: sa @228b manta buddh'a n'a na /
K12D0494_H0462:228b-2: de nas yang dag gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12D0494_H0462:228b-4: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa de dag dang /
K12D0494_H0462:228b-5: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag
K12D0494_H0462:228b-6: thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas mig mi 'dzum
K12D0494_H0462:228b-7: par thams cad mkhyen pa la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
K12D0494_H0462:228b-8: te tshig 'di skad ces brjod do //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-9: byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-10: sangs rgyas kun gyi nor gyi dbyig /
K12D0494_H0462:228b-11: 'dis ni gang dag sangs rgyas dang //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-12: byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-13: rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos pa; ;mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'dir //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-14: sangs rgyas ye shes bla med pa //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-15: dpe med ye shes thob nas su //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-17: sa steng kun tu rnam par spyod; ;de bas 'di dag so so yi //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-18: cho ga rgyas pa dag dang las //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-19: sna tshogs dgod pa thams cad kyang //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-20: bstan pa 'di la bshad du gsol //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-21: des ni gsang sngags spyod pa yi //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-22: theg chen bla na med pa la //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-23: sems can rnams ni dga' bzhin du //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-24: mthong ba'i chos la gnas par 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-25: de skad gsol nas bcom ldan gyis //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-26: 'jam pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa; ;khyed rnams mthun par rtse gcig tu //
K12D0494_H0462:228b-27: mnyam par zhog la 'di nyon cig /
K12D0494_H0462:228b-28: de'i chos gzhi rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs
K12D0494_H0462:228b-29: te nyid kyi sku las byang chub kyi snying po
K12D0494_H0462:229a-2: aa ni mchog tu shes bya ba //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-3: dbang chen dkyil 'khor ldan pa ste //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-4: phyi rol dang ni nang du yang //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-5: rdo rje dkyil 'khor shes par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-6: der 'dug nas ni thams cad bsam //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-7: rnal 'byor gnas shes bshad pa yin //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-8: aa ni srog gi dam pa ste //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-9: 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog tu bshad //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-10: nam zhig klad kor gyis mnan na //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-11: lus can kun gyi sel bar 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-12: sngags pas nam zhig zla gcig tu //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-13: rdo rje can gyis rgya bcings nas //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-14: dus gsum bzlas brjod byas na ni //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-15: mi shes grong khyer 'joms par 'gyur; ;lha dang lha min rnams kyis kyang //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-16: mi phyed shin tu brtan par 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-17: bdag gi rnyed pa grub bya'i phyir //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-18: rgyas pa'i las ni gang cung zad //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-19: de kun rtag tu sngags pa yis //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-20: dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su bya //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-21: gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-22: thor tshugs dbu brgyan 'chang ba yi //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-23: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting 'dzin bzhugs //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-24: dbang chen gyi ni gzhi zhes bya; ;rdo rje padma ral gri dang //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-25: de bzhin dang par bshad pa dang //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-26: gser dag dang ni sa dag dang //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-27: yang na yid bzhin nor bu'ang rung //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-28: de la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-29: dbang chen du ni bsgoms te bsgrub //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-30: mnan pa dag kyang bshad par bya'i //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-31: 'di ni khyed kyis mnyam bzhag nyon //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-32: sngags pas mdor na ri rab ni //
K12D0494_H0462:229a-33: rtse mo brgyad pa bsam par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-0: de yi steng du @229b padma gzhag /
K12D0494_H0462:229b-1: de yi rjes la rdo rje'o //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-2: de'i steng rnal 'byor pa yis ni //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-3: yi ge dam pa gtso bo ste //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-4: de yis spyi bor mnan na ni //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-5: de ni mi g-yo gnas par 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-6: sman la yang ni lan brgya ru //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-7: bzlas brjod byas te mis 'thungs na //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-8: sngon gyi las las byung ba yi //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-10: de nas gzhan yang des pa yis //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-11: ba zhes bya ba dam pa nyon //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-12: gangs dang 'o ma dung 'dra ba; ;lte ba'i dbus nas byung ba ste //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-14: de yi dbus na rab tu gnas //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-15: mgon po dam pa rab tu zhi //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-17: de yi dkyil 'khor ngo mtshar can; ;rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-18: kun tu dkar por bsam par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-19: khyud khor rim pa dgus kyang bskor //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-20: gdung pa thams cad zhi byed pa //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-21: smug zil 'dus pa'i nang na gnas //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-22: 'o ma mu tig phreng dkar dang //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-24: chu rgyun rnams kyis 'khor yug tu //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-25: kun nas rab tu 'bar ba bzhin //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-26: sngags pas yid la bsams na ni //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-27: gdung ba kun las thar bar 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-28: mnyam par bzhag pas dngos 'di rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-30: mar gsar 'o ma mu tig phreng //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-31: de bzhin khyu mchog shel kyang rung //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-32: 'o ma 'am yang na chu yang rung //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-33: de la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-34: dngos grub sna tshogs grub phyir bsgrub //
K12D0494_H0462:229b-35: tshe ni ring bar 'gyur ba dang //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-2: nad rnams kun las thar pa dang //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-3: skal ba bzang po mchog 'gyur dang //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-4: yid rno 'dzin par nus pa dang //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-5: shes rab shin tu dri med dang //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-6: sgrub pa'i rdzas ni 'di rnams kyis //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-7: de dag thams cad myur du 'grub //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-9: zhi bar byed par bshad pa yin //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-10: klad kyi 'khor dang bcas byas na //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-11: sel bar byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-12: ra zhes bya ba yang dag mchog /
K12D0494_H0462:230a-14: des ni las rnams gang cung zad //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-15: mtshams med lnga las byung ba yang //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-16: rnal 'byor shin tu mnyam bzhag nas //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-17: bsams na de kun zad par 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-18: yid 'ong thams cad rab tu dmar //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-19: gru gsum pa yi tshul du gnas //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-21: sum mdo'i ris mtshan snying gar gzhag /
K12D0494_H0462:230a-23: ra ni klad kor bcas par bsam //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-24: mi 'jigs pas ni ci rigs par //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-25: dngos po 'di dag des bsgrub bo //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-26: nyi ma dang ni gza' kun dang //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-27: de bzhin bsgrims te me dang ni //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-28: dbang du bya ba'i rdzas rnams dang //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-30: bskam pa dang ni gsad pa dang //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-31: de bzhin dgar dang gnod pa dag /
K12D0494_H0462:230a-32: me dang lhan cig 'di sbyar na //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-33: de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:230a-34: ha zhes bya ba dam pa mchog /
K12D0494_H0462:230b-0: rlung ni thams cad yang dag @230b 'byung //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-1: rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu dang //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-2: gang gis sa bon rnams skye ba //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-3: 'di ni klad kor bcas sbyar na //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-4: de dag thams cad 'jig par byed //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-5: de yi gzugs kyang bshad pa ni //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-6: kha dog nag la 'od po che //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-8: kun tu yang ni rnam par 'phro //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-9: mkhas pas smin ma'i mtshams su ni //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-10: dkyil 'khor la ni gnas par bsam //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-11: de ni mthing ga zla gam 'dra //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-12: rtog dang bcas par ba dan g-yo //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-13: yi ge rab tu mi 'gyur ba //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-14: sngags pas der gnas bsam par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-15: dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-16: gang gis mthong ba kho na la //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-17: sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-18: dngos grub rnams ni de tshe bsgrub //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-19: mkha' la 'gro ba nyid dang ni //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-20: yang na rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-21: lha yi mig dang rna ba dang //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-22: sngags pas de bzhin 'thob pa dang //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-23: mi snang ba la sogs kun dang //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-24: dbye ba dag kyang gang gsungs pa //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-25: sngags par mnyam par bzhag pa yis //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-26: dkyil 'khor gnas na de kun byed; ;'di ni snying po byang chub 'dir //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-27: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-28: rgyu kun dmigs su med sgo nas //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-29: bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-30: rgyu med pas na 'bras bu'ang med //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-31: las kyang yod pa ma yin te //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-32: dngos po de gsum med pas na //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-33: stong pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:230b-34: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthu chen gyis //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-2: klad kor bcas par ldan pa ste //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-3: khams ni stong pa'i mchog ces bya //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-4: ral gri phyag rgyar ldan pa yis //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-5: bsgrub par bya ba nges par bsgrub //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-6: ral gri zhags pa 'khor lo dang //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-7: lcags mda' de bzhin tho ba ste //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-8: rdzas de rnams dang ldan na ni //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-9: go 'phang dam pa sgrub par byed //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
K12D0494_H0462:231a-11: gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la
K12D0494_H0462:231a-12: bka' stsal pa / gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
K12D0494_H0462:231a-13: nam byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas
K12D0494_H0462:231a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas bdag nyid
K12D0494_H0462:231a-15: aa zhes bya ba'i rang gi ngo bor bsgyur nas
K12D0494_H0462:231a-16: phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i dngos po thams cad
K12D0494_H0462:231a-17: la mi lta bar gyur cing /
K12D0494_H0462:231a-20: gser du mtshungs pa la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyes pa rnams dang /
K12D0494_H0462:231a-21: sdig pa'i las rnam par spangs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:231a-22: de tshe de ni dag 'gyur ba //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-23: thub pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-24: des na las rnams thams cad nus //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-25: nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-26: de nas gzhan sngags rnal 'byor la //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-27: gzhol zhing cho ga shes pa yis; ;sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-28: ba zhes bya ba'i las bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-29: snying rje las byung sems kyis ni //
K12D0494_H0462:231a-30: 'jig rten sdug bsngal la dmigs nas //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-0: mgon po @231b de yis bdag nyid kyi //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-1: lus ni thams cad nyid du yang //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-2: gangs dang ba yi 'o ma ltar //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-3: dkar ba'i rgyun gyis yongs su dgang //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-4: de tshe nges pa bskyed nas su //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-5: yan lag rnams ni thams cad kyi; ;ba spu'i bu ga kun nas kyang /
K12D0494_H0462:231b-6: shin tu dri med chu rgyun 'byung //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-7: chu yis sa ni ma lus pa //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-8: 'di dag yongs su dgang bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-9: gang gis chu de 'thungs pa yang //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-10: lag pas kyang ni reg kyang rung //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-11: de kun nges par byang chub tu //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-13: yan lag kun tu ra zhes pa //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-15: kun tu rnam par 'phro ba ni //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-16: shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsam //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-17: de tshe rnal 'byor pa yis phyir //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-18: 'bar ba kun tu snang byed pa //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-19: btang na ra yis rnam sprul pas //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-20: sngags pa 'dod pa bzhin du byed //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-21: ra zhes bya ba ro stod du //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-22: ba zhes bya ba lte ba khung //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-24: de tshe gcig car ston par 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-25: dmyal ba grang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-26: ras ni shin tu zhi bar byed //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-27: sngags pa sngags kyi tshul gnas pas //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-28: bas kyang tsha la sogs pa bzhi //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-29: ha zhes bya ba ba dan bcas //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-30: ra zhes bya ba'i 'og tu gzhag /
K12D0494_H0462:231b-31: sdig dang ldan pa'i mi rnams kyang //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-32: de yis las rnams myur du sgrub //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-33: sngags pa dbang chen la 'dug nas //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-34: chu yi las ni brtsams par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:231b-35: sel ba la sogs thams cad kyang //
K12D0494_H0462:232a-2: thams cad 'jig par byed pa'ang de //
K12D0494_H0462:232a-3: rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i //
K12D0494_H0462:232a-4: las rnams dbye ba las byung ba //
K12D0494_H0462:232a-5: gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni; ;cho ga 'di yis rab tu bya //
K12D0494_H0462:232a-6: yid yongs su sbyong zhing bzlas brjod byas na /
K12D0494_H0462:232a-7: yid rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0494_H0462:232a-8: lus yang bar goms par byed cing 'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byed na /
K12D0494_H0462:232a-9: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0494_H0462:232a-10: tsog pur 'dug la aa zhes bya ba rna bar bzhag ste zla ba gcig tu bzlas na /
K12D0494_H0462:232a-11: lha'i rna ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0494_H0462:232a-13: dngos grub kyi go 'phang de lta bu la sogs pa dag ni /
K12D0494_H0462:232a-14: yid las byung ba yin no //
K12D0494_H0462:232a-16: rnam par bsam pa tsam kho nas dngos po gzugs
K12D0494_H0462:232a-17: can ma yin pa rnams kyi 'du byed rnam pa
K12D0494_H0462:232a-18: tha dad pa sna tshogs rnams las thams cad pa'i
K12D0494_H0462:232a-19: sa bon gyi bya ba tshig tu brjod pa tsam

K12D0494_H0462:237a-10: gsang sngags spyad pa ji skad gsungs pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol /
K12D0494_H0462:237a-11: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:237a-12: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsang ba
K12D0494_H0462:237a-13: pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad
K12D0494_H0462:237a-15: nga ni 'jig rten dang po yi //
K12D0494_H0462:237a-16: 'jig rten mgon zhes bsgrags pa yin //
K12D0494_H0462:237a-17: bla med gzod nas zhi ba ni //
K12D0494_H0462:237a-18: mnyam pa med pa'i chos bshad do //
K12D0494_H0462:237a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa
K12D0494_H0462:237a-20: de dag gsungs nas byin gyis rlabs gang gis byin
K12D0494_H0462:237a-21: gyis brlabs na // byang chub sems dpa' de rnams dang /
K12D0494_H0462:237a-22: rdo rje 'dzin de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das byang
K12D0494_H0462:237a-23: chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la bzhugs pa
K12D0494_H0462:237a-24: / nam mkha' bzhin du spros pa med pa spyod
K12D0494_H0462:237a-25: pa la gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mtshan
K12D0494_H0462:237a-26: nyid las kyi rnam par smin pa bzhin du mthong
K12D0494_H0462:237a-27: bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byin gyis brlab pa
K12D0494_H0462:237b-0: / mdzad do // de'i tshe bcom ldan @237b 'das kyi yan lag dang /
K12D0494_H0462:237b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad nas 'jig rten pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:237b-6: bsam gtan du bya ba dang /
K12D0494_H0462:237b-7: dngos grub sgrub par mngon par brtson pa thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa /
K12D0494_H0462:237b-9: yi ge thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa /
K12D0494_H0462:237b-11: dpung gnyen du gyur pa 'di phyung ngo //
K12D0494_H0462:237b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:237b-17: byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang
K12D0494_H0462:237b-18: chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la sangs
K12D0494_H0462:237b-19: rgyas kyi mdzad pa so sor nye bar gnas pa
K12D0494_H0462:237b-20: yin te / chos thams cad ni /
K12D0494_H0462:237b-21: aa zhes bya ba'i sgo nas 'jug go //
K12D0494_H0462:237b-24: byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang
K12D0494_H0462:237b-25: chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de bzhin gshegs
K12D0494_H0462:237b-26: pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:237b-28: byang chub kyi sems mngon du bya bar 'dod pa /
K12D0494_H0462:237b-29: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs par 'dod pa /
K12D0494_H0462:237b-30: sems can rnams kyi don bya bar 'dod pa /
K12D0494_H0462:237b-31: dngos grub mngon par 'dod pa; rnam pa thams cad
K12D0494_H0462:237b-32: du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pas
K12D0494_H0462:237b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po 'di la
K12D0494_H0462:238a-0: brtson par bya'o // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis @238a *//
K12D0494_H0462:238a-1: snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di'i cho ga dgod pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:238a-2: lha'i gnas gtan la dbab pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:238a-3: ting nge 'dzin rnam par sprul pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:238a-5: bsam par bya ba gsungs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:238a-6: de la slob dpon gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
K12D0494_H0462:238a-7: kyi sgo aa zhes bya ba la gnas te srad
K12D0494_H0462:238a-8: bu blangs la sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
K12D0494_H0462:238a-9: nas srad bu shar phyogs logs su bres te g-yas
K12D0494_H0462:238a-10: su bskor la / byang phyogs su kha bltas nas
K12D0494_H0462:238a-11: srad bu bres te nub phyogs su kha bltas la
K12D0494_H0462:238a-13: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' lag na rdo rjer de'i phyag rgya'am /
K12D0494_H0462:238a-14: yi ge ba zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs te
K12D0494_H0462:238a-15: nang du zhugs la snying po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar
K12D0494_H0462:238a-16: bya'o // de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la
K12D0494_H0462:238a-17: yang 'di ltar bdag nyid gzod ma nas zhi ba
K12D0494_H0462:238a-18: bya'o // / gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi gzugs /
K12D0494_H0462:238a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs snying po nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs la /
K12D0494_H0462:238a-20: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa mngon du
K12D0494_H0462:238a-21: byed cing srad bu bres la phyi rol gyi dkyil
K12D0494_H0462:238a-22: 'khor de las sum gnyis lha'i gnas su bzhag ste
K12D0494_H0462:238a-24: dkyil 'khor lhag ma gnyis kyang de bzhin du rnam par phye la lha'i gnas bshams par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-0: de nas yang bdag nyid bcom @238b ldan 'das rnam
K12D0494_H0462:238b-1: par snang mdzad du de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs
K12D0494_H0462:238b-2: la chos kyi dbyings rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs
K12D0494_H0462:238b-3: te thog mar tshon rtsi dkar po blangs la 'di
K12D0494_H0462:238b-4: ltar byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-5: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-6: sems can khams ni rnam sbyong ba //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-7: 'dir ni bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-8: nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-9: de ltar blo can gyis bsams nas //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-10: der ni ra zhes bya ba yang //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-11: zhi ba 'bar ba'i phreng can mdog /
K12D0494_H0462:238b-12: dung zla kun da 'dra ba bsam //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-13: de nas tshon rtsi gnyis pa ni //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-14: dmar po blangs nas nan tan du //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-15: yi ge aa zhes bya ba ni //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-16: 'bar ba klad kor bcas par bsam //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-17: rgyal ba thub dka' dam pa ste //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-18: nyi ma dang po 'char ba bzhin //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-19: de nas sngags pas tshon gsum pa //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-20: kha dog ser po blang bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-21: mkhas pas de nas ka zhes pa //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-22: de tshe cho ga bzhin du bsam //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-23: de bzhin gser 'od thub pa ni //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-24: gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-25: ting 'dzin gnas shing sdig bcom pa; ;kun tu rnam par snang ba yin //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-27: tshon rtsi 'khor ba las sgrol ba //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-28: ba zhes bya ba de ru gzhag /
K12D0494_H0462:238b-29: byang chub snying po'i thub chen de //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-30: dpa' bo kha dog ljang 'dra ba //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-31: kun tu 'jigs pa med par byed //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-32: de nas tshon rtsi nag po de //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-33: mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas su //
K12D0494_H0462:238b-34: der ni ha zhes bya ba bsam //
K12D0494_H0462:239a-1: mtha'i me ltar mi bzad pa //
K12D0494_H0462:239a-2: lag na rdo rje rtse phran brgyan //
K12D0494_H0462:239a-3: bdud sde sdang ba thams cad la //
K12D0494_H0462:239a-4: rnam pa kun tu sdigs par byed //
K12D0494_H0462:239a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de'i
K12D0494_H0462:239a-6: ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas mtha' yas par
K12D0494_H0462:239a-7: rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
K12D0494_H0462:239a-9: bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thams
K12D0494_H0462:239a-10: cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i
K12D0494_H0462:239a-11: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams
K12D0494_H0462:239a-12: cad kyi yul las byung ba 'di byung ngo //
K12D0494_H0462:239a-13: na ma:sarbba ta th'a ga te bhye:/
K12D0494_H0462:239a-15: aa sa me pa ra me /
K12D0494_H0462:239a-19: sarbba tr'a nu ga te sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:239a-20: de nas tshon gyi cho ga byin gyis brlabs nas
K12D0494_H0462:239a-21: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu
K12D0494_H0462:239a-22: phyin pa bklags sam phyag byas te rig sngags kyi
K12D0494_H0462:239a-23: rgyal mo 'di lan brgyad du bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:239a-24: de nas langs te dkyil 'khor bskor la nang du zhugs nas byams pa chen po dang /
K12D0494_H0462:239a-25: snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis sgrub pa po la dmigs te /
K12D0494_H0462:239a-26: bdag nyid ba zhes bya bas las kyi rdo rje
K12D0494_H0462:239a-27: sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la rdo rje dam pa
K12D0494_H0462:239a-28: sbyin pa dang lhan cig tu snying rje chen po'i
K12D0494_H0462:239a-29: snying po 'byung ba 'di'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o
K12D0494_H0462:239a-30: // de la nang gi dkyil 'khor gtan la dbab pa ni /
K12D0494_H0462:239b-0: dbus su bcom @239b ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po padma dkar po la bzhugs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:239b-1: dbu thor tshugs dang dbu rgyan can /
K12D0494_H0462:239b-2: dar ram ras kyi smad g-yogs dang /
K12D0494_H0462:239b-3: dar la'i stod g-yogs mnabs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:239b-4: gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:239b-9: shar phyogs su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sku'i
K12D0494_H0462:239b-10: ngo bo aa zhes bya ba klad kor dang bcas
K12D0494_H0462:239b-12: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum bcom ldan 'das ma nam mkha'i spyan bri'o //
K12D0494_H0462:239b-13: yang na yi ge ga zhes bya ba bri'o; ;ga /
K12D0494_H0462:239b-14: me'i phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
K12D0494_H0462:239b-15: phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu'am yi ge ka
K12D0494_H0462:239b-18: byang phyogs su lag na padma 'khor byang chub sems
K12D0494_H0462:239b-19: dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dag dang lhan
K12D0494_H0462:239b-20: cig tu padma'i phyag rgya'am yi ge sa zhes bya
K12D0494_H0462:239b-22: lho phyogs su cha gsum bor te gsang ba pa'i
K12D0494_H0462:239b-23: bdag po lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa
K12D0494_H0462:239b-24: rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'am yi ge ba zhes bya
K12D0494_H0462:239b-25: ba bri'o // de'i cha gsum bor ba la rdo
K12D0494_H0462:239b-26: rje 'chang thams cad kyi phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o
K12D0494_H0462:239b-27: ba bri'o // // de la yi ge'i 'bru ni /
K12D0494_H0462:239b-29: h'um/ de nas bden bral gyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das
K12D0494_H0462:239b-30: rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'og logs su mi g-yo
K12D0494_H0462:239b-31: ba pha bong gi steng na 'dug pa /
K12D0494_H0462:239b-32: lag na ral gri dang zhags pa thogs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:240a-1: thams cad sdigs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o //
K12D0494_H0462:240a-4: ham/ rlung gi phyogs su 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
K12D0494_H0462:240a-5: rgyal ba zhes bya ba bgegs chen po 'joms pa
K12D0494_H0462:240a-6: / gyen du 'bar ba'i phreng ba can /
K12D0494_H0462:240a-7: rab tu 'jigs pa chen po'i dus kyi me'i gzugs 'dra ba /
K12D0494_H0462:240a-9: lag na rdo rje'i 'od 'phro ba can thogs ba de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o //
K12D0494_H0462:240a-13: de nas phyogs bzhir srung ba chen po bzhi dgod do //
K12D0494_H0462:240a-14: de la shar phyogs su mi 'jigs pa zhes bya
K12D0494_H0462:240a-15: ba'i srung ba chen mo gser gyi kha dog 'dra
K12D0494_H0462:240a-16: ba / gos dkar po gyon pa /
K12D0494_H0462:240a-18: lag na dbyug pa thogs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o //
K12D0494_H0462:240a-22: byang phyogs su 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed
K12D0494_H0462:240a-23: pa zhes bya ba'i srung ba kha dog dkar mo
K12D0494_H0462:240a-24: / lag na ral gri thogs shing gos dkar po gyon pa 'bar ba dang bcas pa /
K12D0494_H0462:240a-25: 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o //
K12D0494_H0462:240a-29: nub phyogs su gdul dka' zhes bya ba'i srung ba aa sho ka dmar po'i mdog 'dra ba /
K12D0494_H0462:240a-32: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la lta ba de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o //
K12D0494_H0462:240b-2: lho phyogs su ma thul ba rdo rjes 'dul ba
K12D0494_H0462:240b-3: zhes bya ba'i srung ba chen mo kha dog nag
K12D0494_H0462:240b-4: mo / bzhin khro gnyer bsnyer ba /
K12D0494_H0462:240b-5: smad g-yogs nag mo gyon pa /
K12D0494_H0462:240b-6: thor tshugs dang cod pan can /
K12D0494_H0462:240b-7: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rang gi 'bar bas mngon par snang bar byed ba /
K12D0494_H0462:240b-8: lag na dbyug pa thogs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:240b-9: bgegs chen po med par byed pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o //
K12D0494_H0462:240b-10: de la de'i yi ge'i 'bru ni /
K12D0494_H0462:240b-13: de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas pa phyag
K12D0494_H0462:240b-14: brnyan dang bcas par padma dkar po la 'dug par
K12D0494_H0462:240b-15: bri'o // de ltar blo can gyi bkod nas //
K12D0494_H0462:240b-16: sngags pa sngags la gzhol ba yis //
K12D0494_H0462:240b-17: cho ga bzhin du phyir byung nas //
K12D0494_H0462:240b-18: gnyis pa'i cha ni nges pa la //
K12D0494_H0462:240b-19: sh'akya'i rigs ni dga' byed pa //
K12D0494_H0462:240b-20: thub pa'i rgyal po bri bar bya; ;mgon po na bza' ngur smrig mnabs //
K12D0494_H0462:240b-21: mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan //
K12D0494_H0462:240b-22: bstan pa yi ni don mdzad lha //
K12D0494_H0462:240b-23: sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin //
K12D0494_H0462:240b-24: sngags pas phyag rgya dgod pa ni /
K12D0494_H0462:240b-25: lhung bzed chos gos la sogs pa'am //
K12D0494_H0462:240b-26: yang na mkhas pas yi ger gzhag /
K12D0494_H0462:240b-29: de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid
K12D0494_H0462:240b-30: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du byin gyis
K12D0494_H0462:240b-31: brlabs la / byang chub kyi sems su gyur pa'i yid kyis cha gsum por te /
K12D0494_H0462:241a-0: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad lan gsum rjes su dran par @241a *//
K12D0494_H0462:241a-1: byas nas tshon de nyid blangs te shar phyogs kyi
K12D0494_H0462:241a-2: cha gsum par rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa gzhon
K12D0494_H0462:241a-3: nu'i gzugs can / lag pa g-yon pa na autpal mthing ga'i steng na rdo rje can thogs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:241a-4: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12D0494_H0462:241a-5: dar ram ras kyi smad g-yogs gyon pa /
K12D0494_H0462:241a-7: kha dog gur gum lta bu /
K12D0494_H0462:241a-8: spyi bo zur phud lnga pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o //
K12D0494_H0462:241a-13: mam/ de'i g-yas phyogs su dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nu'i gzugs can /
K12D0494_H0462:241a-14: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
K12D0494_H0462:241a-15: lag na rin po che'i dra ba'am lcags kyu thogs pa phyag rgya'am yi ge'i 'brur bri'o //
K12D0494_H0462:241a-19: de nas lho phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' sgrib
K12D0494_H0462:241a-20: pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba
K12D0494_H0462:241a-22: thor tshugs dang cod pan can /
K12D0494_H0462:241a-23: lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o //
K12D0494_H0462:241a-27: byang phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po zhes bya ba kha dog ljang gu /
K12D0494_H0462:241a-29: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o //
K12D0494_H0462:241a-33: nub phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying
K12D0494_H0462:241a-34: po zhes bya ba rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
K12D0494_H0462:241a-35: dang ldan pa / gos dkar po gyon pa /
K12D0494_H0462:241b-1: lag na ral gri thogs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-5: chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba yi //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-6: sngags ba de nas 'dug nas su //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-7: chos kyi dbyings su rang bzhin gyi //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-8: byang chub sems su gyur pa'i yid //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-9: shar phyogs kha bltas gnas nas ni //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-10: rdo rje can gyi rgya bcings nas //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-11: de nas las kyi rdo rjer gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-12: nan tan du ni mchod pa bya; ;kun tu khyab pa'i yid kyis su //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-13: sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-14: dam tshig ces bya'i rgya bstan nas //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-15: gsang sngags lan gsum bzla bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-16: slob ma gtsang ma chog bzhin; ;bos te dkyil 'khor mdun du ni //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-17: de dag gsum la skyabs su gtang //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-18: de nas byang chub sems kyang bskyed //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-19: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-20: phyag rgya de dag kun la bcing de nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i bcing //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-21: yid kyis de yi gzugs bsgyur te //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-22: ras kyis gdong ba bkab nas ni //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-23: snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis su //
K12D0494_H0462:241b-24: byang chub tshogs ni rdzogs bya'i phyir //

K12D0494_H0462:260b-25: rgyal po rnams kyis bsngags pa'o //
K12D0494_H0462:260b-26: phal pa rnams ni ci rigs par //
K12D0494_H0462:260b-27: sa yi bye brag dag las bsam //
K12D0494_H0462:260b-28: mchod pa rnam bzhir shes bya ste //
K12D0494_H0462:260b-29: phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar ba dang //
K12D0494_H0462:260b-30: de bzhin byams dang snying rje dang //
K12D0494_H0462:260b-31: me tog bdug spos 'jig rten pa'i //
K12D0494_H0462:260b-32: sor mo las byung me tog rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:260b-33: skyob pa kun la dbul bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:260b-34: yan lag kun 'byung phyag rgya ni //
K12D0494_H0462:260b-35: bcings nas byang chub sems bsgoms te //
K12D0494_H0462:260b-36: sor mo mgon po thams cad dang //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-2: 'di ni skyon med me tog ste //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-3: rab tu bsung zhim rnam par mdzes //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-4: chos kyi dbyings kyi ljon shing rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-5: rgyal ba mchod pa'i phyir byung ba //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-6: ting 'dzin dbang gis bsgyur ba yi //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-7: sngags kyis de dag byin brlabs na //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-8: chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-9: sprin mang rgya cher dam pa rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-10: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni; ;de tshe rtag tu char bzhin 'bab //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-11: lha rnams phal pa gzhan la ni //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-12: me tog 'di rnams bsgrags pa ste //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-13: rang gi sngags rgyud rgyas shes pas //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-14: ji ltar rigs par dbul bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-15: de bzhin me tog bdug spos rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-16: ji ltar rig par rnam par bsam //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-17: mthe bo srin lag sbyar ba ni //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-18: bkra shis pa zhes bshad pa ste //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-19: de yis me tog de blangs nas //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-20: rang gi snying ga'i phyogs nas dbul //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-21: 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams la //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-22: lte ba'i thad ga nas zhes bya //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-23: bdug spos rdo rje'i khu tshur ram //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-24: yang na padma'i phreng ba yis //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-25: bar snang la ni bzung nas su; ;'jig rten mgon skyob rnams la dbul //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-26: de las gzhan pa'i 'jig rten pa'i //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-27: lha rnams la ni go rim bzhin //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-28: phyi dang nang gi bye brag gis //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-29: sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis zhes bya; ;las dang tshe las rnam par grol //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-30: slar yang sa bon 'byung ba ste //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-31: las 'dod pa yis sbyin sreg bya //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-32: nang gi sbyin sreg ces su bshad //
K12D0494_H0462:261a-33: phyi rol gyi ni gsum ldan zhing //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-0: gnas @261b gsum dang ni gsum la gnas //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-1: las gsum gyi ni las grub pa //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-2: 'jig rten pa yi sbyin sreg mchog /
K12D0494_H0462:261b-3: sbyin sreg las ni mi shes pas //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-4: gang dag gzhan du byed pa ni //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-5: sngags kyi shes la spangs pa ste //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-6: glen des 'bras bu mi thob bo //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-7: de bzhin gshegs pas gsang sngags dang //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-8: de bzhin rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-9: dkar dang ser du shes par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-10: phyag na rdo rje thams cad pa; ;'jig rten dbang phyug gsang sngags ni //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-11: las kyi bye brag dag las dkar //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-12: kun tu gru bzhi lham pa dang //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-13: go rim bzhin du zlum po dang //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-14: gru gsum dang ni zla ga ma 'dra //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-15: dbyibs ni legs par bshad pa yin //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-16: gzugs ni gnyis su shes bya ba //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-17: bud med dang ni skyes pa nyid //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-18: yang na kun tu thams cad kyi //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-19: kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams te //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-20: bsam yas ye shes las byung bas //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-21: de bas de rnams bsam yas te //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-22: ye shes mkhyen gyi ye shes ni //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-23: sems can don phyir tha dad gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-24: yid kyi rgya ni ji tsam pa //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-25: bstan dang phyag rgya dag dang ni //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-26: lha yi tshad kyang go rim bzhin //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-27: de tsam du ni shes par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-28: sangs rgyas gang nas byung ba nas //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-29: phyag rgya rnams kyang de nas byung //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-30: chos las byung ba'i slob ma rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-31: chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-32: de bas mdor na chos kyi dbyings //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-33: mtshan ma phyag rgya yin par bshad //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-34: dbang bskur gsum du shes bya ste //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-35: de bas nan tan nyan par gyis //
K12D0494_H0462:261b-36: phyag rgyas gang zhig dbang bskur ba //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-2: skyob pa rnams kyi dbang bskur pa //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-3: de ni mchog ste dang po yin //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-4: gnyis pa las dang bya ba yis //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-5: kun nas bslang bar yang dag bshad //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-6: gsum pa yid kyis shes bya ste //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-7: yul dang dus ni spangs pa'o //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-8: bla ma legs par mgu byas nas //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-9: phan par byed pas gang smras pa'i //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-10: dbang bskur 'di ni mchog yin par //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-11: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrags //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-12: sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdor na ni //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-13: dam tshig can rnams lngar bshad de //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-15: dam tshig shes pa gcig ces bya //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-16: de la phyag rgya mi bstan cing //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-17: sngags kyang sbyin par mi bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-18: byang chub sems kyi bye brag las //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-19: sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su gzung //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-21: dam tshig can gnyis shes par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-22: dkyil 'khor dang ni phyag rgya mthong //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-23: las dang bya ba la yang sbyar //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-24: bla mas lung ni ma byin pa //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-25: de yang dam tshig shes par bshad //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-26: phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bri ba rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-27: de tshe cho ga bzhin du bstan //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-28: gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung ba yi //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-29: dbang bskur med pa'i sngags pa'ang yin //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-30: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-31: sngags pa cho gas dbang bskur ba //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-32: dam tshig shes pa lngar shes bya //
K12D0494_H0462:262a-33: dam tshig can zhes gzhan mi bya //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-0: brtul zhugs bzang po byang @262b chub phyir //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-1: gang zhig sems ni sgom pa na //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-2: sngags pa gnas gsum mi dmigs pa //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-3: de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-4: thabs kyi snying stobs bskyed nas su //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-5: sems can don la sbyor pa na //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-6: dmigs su med pa'i spyod 'thob pa //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-7: rgyal ba'i mchog tu shes par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-8: thog ma nas ni zhi ba'i chos /
K12D0494_H0462:262b-9: ngo bo nyid ni med pa la //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-10: gang gi sems ni ri rab bzhin /
K12D0494_H0462:262b-11: gnas pa de ni bden pa mthong //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-13: de bzhin du ni mi slu ba //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-14: ji ltar sangs rgyas bden gzigs pa //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-15: de bzhin sngon ni ngas mthong ba'i //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-16: byang chub sems thob gang yin de //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-17: dngos grub de las gzhan ci dgos //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-18: de las gzhan du'ang dngos grub ni //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-19: rnam pa dag ni sngar 'dod de //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-20: spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-21: de bzhin sa ni gnon pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:262b-23: sangs rgyas nyid dang gang gzhan no //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-24: rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa yi //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-25: las ni ji srid mnyams shing //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-26: rnam smin rnam par ma smin te //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-27: dngos grub dag gi dus su 'dod //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-28: mdor na gang tshe dus gcig tu //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-29: las dang skye ba 'phangs gyur pa //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-30: de tshe'ang sngags pas dngos grub ni //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-31: yid las yang dag byung ba 'thob //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-33: grub nas mkha' la 'gro ba ni //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-34: ji ltar sgyu ma 'jigs med bzhin //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-35: sngags kyi drangs rmongs byed pa //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-36: ji ltar mig 'phrul chen po bzhin //
K12D0494_H0462:262b-37: gang la lus dang dgra med pa //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-2: de bzhin mi snang 'gyur zhes bya //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-3: de ni de na gnas pa yin //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-4: ji ltar nyal ba'i rmi lam na //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-5: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su phyin //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-6: lus kyang spangs pa ma yin la //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-7: de nyid kyis kyang de ma song //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-8: de bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis kyang //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-9: sngags pa sngags la gnas pa dag /
K12D0494_H0462:263a-10: bsod nams bya ba'i las rnams kyis //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-12: lus dang ngag yid las byung ba'i //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-13: gsang sngags yid bzhin nor bu 'dra //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-14: de las rnam par bsams pa'i don //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-16: ji ltar nam mkha'i phyogs rnams su //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-17: 'dus byas spyod yul thams cad kyis //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-18: mi gos de bzhin sngags pa yang //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-19: rtog pa'i spyod yul kun gyis so //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-21: nam zhig de ltar bsgoms gyur cing //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-22: rnam par bsgoms na sngags pa de //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-23: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lhan cig dga'//
K12D0494_H0462:263a-24: sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo yis; ;sbyin sreg gnyis su bshad pa ni //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-25: phyi rol gyi dang nang gi ste //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-26: de yang tshim par bya dang bcas //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-27: lha rnams kyang ni so so yi //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-28: rang bzhin yongs su mkhyen nas su //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-29: 'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams kyis //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-30: tshad dag legs par gsum pa ni //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-31: dbang phyug la sogs mthu chen rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-32: bkur ba'i lha rnams gang yin pa //
K12D0494_H0462:263a-33: de dag gis ni gang byas pa'i //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-0: @263b sngags dang phyag rgya stobs chen rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-2: tshad ni bshad pa de yin no //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-4: chos can de dag brtan pa med //

K12D0494_H0462:263b-7: las dang skye ba kun bcad pa //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-8: nyes pa gsum bral rgyal ba dang //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-9: rang rgyal bse ru lta bu dang //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-10: de bzhin rgyal ba'i nyan thos dang //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-12: gsang sngags tshad ni sngon bshad pa //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-13: dus gsum las ni shin tu 'das //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-14: rten cing 'brel pa las byung ba //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-15: mthong dang ma mthong 'bras bu'i tshad //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-16: ngag yid lus las byung ba'o //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-18: bskal pa gcig tu bshad pa yin //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-19: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-21: sangs rgyas drang srong chen po dang //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-22: rgyal sras rnams kyi ting 'dzin ni //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-23: mtshan ma med cing dag pa'o //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-24: 'jig rten pa yi mtshan mar bcas //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-25: rnam par smin pa 'di nyid la //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-27: nam zhig dngos grub thob pa na //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-28: de tshe las kyang ldog par 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-29: sems ni ngo bo nyid med phyir //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-30: rgyud dang 'bras bu rnam spangs shing //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-31: yang dang tshe las rnam grol na //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-32: nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur ba yin //
K12D0494_H0462:263b-34: gzhan yang phyag rgya'i gzugs su dgod pa rim par phye ba /
K12D0494_H0462:264a-1: gnas par byin gyis rlob pa /
K12D0494_H0462:264a-3: byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang
K12D0494_H0462:264a-4: chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa chos kyi dbyings
K12D0494_H0462:264a-5: rtogs pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa /
K12D0494_H0462:264a-6: sems can gyi khams ma lus par bsgral bar yi
K12D0494_H0462:264a-7: dam bcas pa rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang
K12D0494_H0462:264a-8: bde ba'i phyir sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon
K12D0494_H0462:264a-9: par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de nyon la legs
K12D0494_H0462:264a-10: par rab tu yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod

K12D0494_H0462:264a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

K12D0494_H0462:264a-17: dkyil 'khor dgod pa rim par phye ba gang las
K12D0494_H0462:264a-19: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor grangs med pa byung ba /
K12D0494_H0462:264a-20: gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba /
K12D0494_H0462:264a-21: snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya

K12D0494_H0462:264a-23: / kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la //

K12D0494_H0462:264a-28: sa bon dang bcas rgyas par byas //
K12D0494_H0462:264a-29: de yi steng du'ang padma che //
K12D0494_H0462:264a-30: phyag rgya klad kor gyis mdzes byas //
K12D0494_H0462:264b-0: 'dab ma brgyad rnams legs par @264b rdzogs //
K12D0494_H0462:264b-1: ze bar bcas pa shin tu bzang //

K12D0494_H0462:264b-17: dung lta bu yi dbus na ni //

K12D0494_H0462:293a-9: nang gis byin sreg yin no //

K12D0494_H0462:293a-14: dga' ba dang ldan pa ni /

K12D0494_H0462:293a-23: pa'i gnas de dang de dag tu ji ltar rigs

K12D0494_H0462:293a-28: bsang gtor dag kyang ji ltar bgyi //

K12D0494_H0462:293a-33: na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to

K12D0494_H0462:293b-1: kha khyer sor bzhi'i tshad du bya //
K12D0494_H0462:293b-2: rdo rje'i mtshan ma dag gis mtshan //

K12D0494_H0462:293b-4: ku sha'i rtsa ni rlon pa dgram //

K12D0494_H0462:293b-6: rtsa bdag kyang rtse mos dkri //

K12D0494_H0462:293b-14: bsang gtor dag kyang de nas bya //
K12D0494_H0462:293b-15: dgang blugs rang gi gsang sngags kyis; ;mkhas pas de la dbul bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:293b-16: de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gam //
K12D0494_H0462:293b-17: yang na rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya //
K12D0494_H0462:293b-18: 'jig rten pa yi sbyin sreg ni //

K12D0494_H0462:293b-20: gzhan yang nang gi sbyin sreg ni //
K12D0494_H0462:293b-21: las dang tshe dag bkag pa ste //

K12D0494_H0462:293b-23: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa spangs //

K12D0494_H0462:293b-34: rlung gi me yang 'phro ba med pa'i shes rab kyis bkag ste /
K12D0494_H0462:293b-35: yid kyi me la sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:293b-36: de ni nang gi sbyin sreg ces //

K12D0494_H0462:294a-2: khyed rnams kyi ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bag yod par gnas pas spyad par bya'o //

K12D0494_H0462:294a-4: gzhan su la yang ma sbyin cig /

K12D0494_H0462:294a-7: nyi ma'i rigs las skyes pa dang //

K12D0494_H0462:294a-10: chog kyang shes shing chos la 'bad //

K12D0494_H0462:294a-15: de kun nga yi sras yin te //
K12D0494_H0462:294a-16: bstan pa'i don la sems pa yin //

K12D0494_H0462:294a-18: 'di ni rtag tu sbyin par bya'o //

K12D0494_H0462:294a-22: mchod pa dag kyang legs byas nas //
K12D0494_H0462:294a-23: spyan sngar 'khod nas thal sbyar te //

K12D0494_H0462:294a-26: ji ltar yun ring kun gnas par //

K12D0494_H0462:294a-28: bstan pa 'di la bshad du gsol //

K12D0494_H0462:294b-17: mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa

K12D0494_H0462:294b-23: las / so //// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag

K12D0494_H0462:294b-25: ;gang dag 'di ltar sgrub pa lhur len pa de

K12D0494_H0462:294b-27: bstan pa 'di la de dag bcings pa bdag gis

K12D0494_H0462:294b-30: g-yas pa dang por legs par gzugs //

K12D0494_H0462:295a-12: goms gcig myur du bor nas ni //
K12D0494_H0462:295a-13: rkang pa btegs te lus bsgyur nas //
K12D0494_H0462:295a-14: gzhu yi tshul gyis steng kun //

K12D0494_H0462:295a-18: gang tshe sngags pa 'dir gnas na //

K12D0494_H0462:295a-20: rkang pa g-yon pa brkyangs nas ni //

K12D0494_H0462:295b-15: blon po la sogs pa dang /

K12D0494_H0462:295b-31: kyi lus la gnod par bya ba gang yang rung

K12D0494_H0462:296a-9: de la re zhig zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg nges pa ni /

K12D0494_H0462:296a-11: song la sa gzhi legs par brtag par bya ste

K12D0494_H0462:296b-0: aam/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi nub phyogs su nam mkha'i snying @296b po ral gri'i phyag rgya'am /
K12D0494_H0462:296b-3: nam mkha'i snying po'i nub phyogs su 'jam dpal te /
K12D0494_H0462:296b-4: de yang autpa la'i phyag rgya'am /
K12D0494_H0462:296b-7: m'am/ de'i nub phyogs su nam mkha'i spyan phyag rgya'am /
K12D0494_H0462:296b-10: sangs rgyas rnams kyi shar phyogs su sh'akya thub pa lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'am /

K12D0494_H0462:296b-24: sa; spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g-yon logs su mthu chen po thob pa padma'i phyag rgya'am /

K12D0494_H0462:296b-34: pam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su rdo rje 'dzin rdo rje'i phyag rgya'am /

K12D0494_H0462:297a-1: m'a ma k'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'am /

K12D0494_H0462:297b-16: de nas 'dug la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings
K12D0494_H0462:297b-17: te dam tshig gi gsang sngags brjod la yi ge
K12D0494_H0462:297b-18: sa dang padma'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid spyan ras gzigs
K12D0494_H0462:297b-19: dbang phyug tu byin gyis brlabs te yi ge aa
K12D0494_H0462:297b-20: rang gi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa las rnam par
K12D0494_H0462:297b-21: snang mdzad chen po'i sku ji lta ba bzhin du
K12D0494_H0462:297b-22: gyur par bsams la nyid kyi phyag rgya yang bstan
K12D0494_H0462:297b-23: par bya'o // de nas ral gri'i phyag rgya bcings

K12D0494_H0462:297b-25: mdzad chen po'i skur byin gyis brlabs te dkyil 'khor
K12D0494_H0462:297b-26: gyi yi ge thams cad so so'i lha'i gzugs su
K12D0494_H0462:297b-27: gyur par bsams la so so'i phyag rgya rnams kyang
K12D0494_H0462:298a-0: par bya'o // bstan to // de nas 'phags pa @298a *//
K12D0494_H0462:298a-1: mi g-yo ba'i sngags zlos shing las kyi rdo rjes bcings la /

K12D0494_H0462:298a-7: me tog la sogs pa so so'i gsang sngags rnams kyis mngon par bsngags te /
K12D0494_H0462:298a-8: byug spos la sogs pa la so so'i snying po'i
K12D0494_H0462:298a-9: gsang sngags kyis kyang mngon par bsngags la dbul lo

K12D0494_H0462:298a-11: de bzhin du thams cad la sbyar ro //
K12D0494_H0462:298a-13: trat aa mo gha tsanda ma h'a ro sha na spho ta ya h'um tra ta ham ma /
K12D0494_H0462:298a-14: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i sngags so //
K12D0494_H0462:298a-16: bi shuddhe gandhod bha ba sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:298a-17: byug spos kyi gsang sngags so //
K12D0494_H0462:298a-19: mah'a mee tri buddha ga te sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:298a-20: me tog gi gsang sngags so //

K12D0494_H0462:298a-22: bdug spos kyi gsang sngags so //
K12D0494_H0462:298a-24: ta th'a ga ta tsi spha ra na aa ba bh'a sa ga ga no ddh'arya sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:298a-30: pa li de ba linda d'a hi sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:298a-33: ga gnas ma sa ma sa sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:298a-34: mchod yon gyi gsang sngags so //
K12D0494_H0462:298b-0: @298b thog ma dang tha mar yang sbyar ro //
K12D0494_H0462:298b-1: snying po'i gsang sngags brjod pa'i cho ga ni /
K12D0494_H0462:298b-2: aom bha ga b'an bee ro tsa na /
K12D0494_H0462:298b-5: ai dam me k'aryam ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:298b-6: de bzhin du thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:298b-8: tsandan dkar po ga pur dang sbyar la dbul /
K12D0494_H0462:298b-9: ma 'byor na mkhas pas pu shel tsi 'bul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:298b-10: de bzhin du me tog padma dkar po dang /
K12D0494_H0462:298b-12: me tog ma li ka dang /
K12D0494_H0462:298b-13: me tog yu ka ti ka la sogs pa me
K12D0494_H0462:298b-14: tog dkar po dri zhim pa bkra shis pa gang
K12D0494_H0462:298b-15: yin pa de dag dbul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:298b-20: yang na shi ba sa ka dbul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:298b-21: bshos kyang zho dang 'bras chan la sogs pa dkar po dbul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:298b-22: mar me yang mar gyi mar me snod dkar po'i
K12D0494_H0462:298b-23: nang du blugs te dbul lo; ;dung la sogs pa
K12D0494_H0462:298b-24: snod dkar po'i nang du tsandan dang /
K12D0494_H0462:298b-26: me tog dkar po sbyar ba'i chu blugs pa'i mchod yon dbul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:298b-27: de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i mchod pa byas nas
K12D0494_H0462:298b-28: de nas phyir byung ste bdag nyid spyan ras gzigs
K12D0494_H0462:298b-29: kyi dbang phyug tu byin gyis brlabs la phyi rol
K12D0494_H0462:298b-30: tu phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin pa ni /
K12D0494_H0462:298b-37: kri sa rar bcas pa mang la snum bag can
K12D0494_H0462:298b-38: de lta bu'i gtor ma slob dpon gyis lag pas
K12D0494_H0462:299a-0: blangs te dga' bzhin du phyogs thams cad du @299a
K12D0494_H0462:299a-1: *// gtor zhing bdug spos dang mchod yon yang dbul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-2: thog mar dbang ldan phyogs su ni //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-3: gzhu can tshogs dang bcas la dbul //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-4: de nas dbang po'i phyogs su yang //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-5: mkhas pas dbang po nyid la dbul //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-6: de nas sngags pa mi 'jigs pas //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-7: me yi phyogs su dbul bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-8: de nas gshin rje'i phyogs su yang //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-9: dbul bar sngags la mkhas pas bshad //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-10: bden bral phyogs su bden bral ni //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-11: tshogs dang bcas la dbul bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-12: chu lha'i phyogs su klu rnams la //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-13: 'jigs byed gsang sngags zlos shing dbul //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-14: bdag dang bcas pa phul nas su //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-15: rlung gi phyogs su 'gro bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-16: sngags la mkhas pas der song nas //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-17: rlung lha tshogs dang bcas pa la //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-18: rang gi ming nas smos nas su //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-19: rang gi sngags kyis gtor ma dbul //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-20: byang gi phyogs su song nas su //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-21: yid ni rab tu dang byas te //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-22: bdag gi dngos grub thob 'dod pas //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-23: gnod sbyin rnams la gtor ma dbul //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-24: srin po rnams dang sha za dang /
K12D0494_H0462:299a-25: 'byung po sha rjen can rnams dang //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-26: sems can rnam pa sna tshogs la //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-27: mkhas pas gtor ma phyogs su gtor //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-28: sa phyogs de yi sems can ni //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-29: shing dang gel pa la gnas pa //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-30: blo la gang dang gang dran pa //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-31: de dang de la gtor ma sbyin //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-32: phyogs kyi gtor ma'i sngags rnams ni //
K12D0494_H0462:299a-33: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ru dr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:299b-0: dbang po'i phyogs su sha @299b kr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:299b-1: me yi phyogs su aagna ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:299b-2: gshin rje'i phyogs su bee ba sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:299b-3: bden bral gyi phyogs su raksha sa aa dhi pa ta ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:299b-4: chu lha'i phyogs su me gha sha n'i ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:299b-5: rlung gi phyogs su b'a ya be sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:299b-6: ku be ra'i phyogs su yaksha bidy'a dha ri sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:299b-12: 'byung po rnams kyi'o; ;de ltar kun tu gtor ma
K12D0494_H0462:299b-13: gtor la lag pa bkrus te nye reg byas la
K12D0494_H0462:299b-14: de nas nang du zhugs te sangs rgyas thams cad
K12D0494_H0462:299b-15: la phyag 'tshal la bsreg par bya ba'i rdzas gang
K12D0494_H0462:299b-16: yang rung ste cung zad ci yod pa de dag
K12D0494_H0462:299b-17: thams cad 'phags pa mi g-yo bas bsangs te g-yas
K12D0494_H0462:299b-20: mchod yon gyi snod gnyis rtsva ku sha dang spos chus sbyar ba blugs te bzhag la gcig ni /
K12D0494_H0462:299b-21: 'phags pa mi g-yo bas bzlas so //
K12D0494_H0462:299b-23: rdo rje mchog gis bzlas so //
K12D0494_H0462:299b-24: zhugs thab kyi kho ra khor yug tu rtsva ku sha bskor ba'i thabs su dgram mo //
K12D0494_H0462:299b-25: bdag rang gar 'dug pa'i gzhir yang rtsva ku sha bskor ba'i thabs su gding ngo //
K12D0494_H0462:299b-26: shing au dum wa ra dang /
K12D0494_H0462:299b-29: mar bzhus pa yang mdun du gzhag go /
K12D0494_H0462:299b-30: de nas me'i thab khung tsandan gyis bskus te me
K12D0494_H0462:299b-31: tog dkar po dri zhim po'i sil ma yang bkram
K12D0494_H0462:299b-32: la bram ze'i khyim nas me blangs la khro bo'i
K12D0494_H0462:300a-1: byas te shing blag sha dang /
K12D0494_H0462:300a-2: au dum ba ra'i bud shing la rlung g-yab kyis me sbar ro //
K12D0494_H0462:300a-3: der kha byang phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag
K12D0494_H0462:300a-4: pa gnyis byug spos kyis bskus te dam tshig gi
K12D0494_H0462:300a-5: phyag rgya la sogs pa bcings la bdag nyid rnam
K12D0494_H0462:300a-6: par snang mdzad chen po'i sku chu'i dkyil 'khor la
K12D0494_H0462:300a-7: gnas pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya dang
K12D0494_H0462:300a-8: / gsang sngags kyis byin gyis brlab bo //
K12D0494_H0462:300a-9: de nas thab khung gi zhabs su chu'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
K12D0494_H0462:300a-10: chu'i dbus su yi ge snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa las me'i gzugs su gyur pa dung dang /
K12D0494_H0462:300a-18: be con thogs shing mi 'jigs pa sbyin ba; gos dkar po bgos pa /
K12D0494_H0462:300a-19: srad bu dkar po se ral khar thogs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:300a-20: snying ga'i sum mdo'i ris mtshan can /
K12D0494_H0462:300a-23: ye shes kyi rang bzhin can /
K12D0494_H0462:300a-24: de lta bu'i me lha bsams la /
K12D0494_H0462:300a-25: 'phags pa mi g-yo bas bsngags pa'i chu sngar bshams
K12D0494_H0462:300a-26: pas me la bskor ba'i thabs su bsang gtor bya'o
K12D0494_H0462:300a-27: // rdo rje mchog sbyin gyis kyang lan gsum du bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:300a-28: na ma:sa manta buddha n'am mam sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:300a-30: de nas me la rang gi gsang sngags kyi byug spos dang /
K12D0494_H0462:300a-31: me tog la sogs pa dbul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:300b-0: de @300b nas mngar gsum las sreg blugs gsum byin
K12D0494_H0462:300b-1: te dgang gzar chang bas bzung la mar gyi dgang
K12D0494_H0462:300b-3: de nas shing au dum ba ra'am /
K12D0494_H0462:300b-4: aa shvattha'i rtse mo'i yam shing rtse gnyis mar la smyugs pa bdun bsreg go /
K12D0494_H0462:300b-5: de nas yang mar gyi gang blugs gsum byin la bsang gtor yang snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:300b-6: na ma:sa manta bud dh'a nam/
K12D0494_H0462:300b-7: aom bar d'a ga na ye sh'antim ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:300b-8: de bzhin du lha thams cad la yang so sor sbyin sreg byas la bsang gtor bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:300b-10: h'um aa mah'a sh'anti ga ta /
K12D0494_H0462:300b-11: sh'anti ka ra pra sh'a ma dharma nir dza ta /
K12D0494_H0462:300b-12: aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba dharma sa manta pr'abha /
K12D0494_H0462:300b-13: aa mu ga sya svasti sh'antim bam ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12D0494_H0462:300b-15: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad dran par byas la
K12D0494_H0462:300b-16: bdag nyid kyis nang rnam par dag pas ji lta
K12D0494_H0462:300b-17: ba bzhin du byang chub kyi sems bsgom mo //
K12D0494_H0462:300b-18: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rang gi rig
K12D0494_H0462:300b-19: sngags bzhag ste rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcings la
K12D0494_H0462:300b-20: rang gi lha'i gzugs su bsgom mo; ;de nas yang
K12D0494_H0462:300b-21: snga ma bzhin du dgang blugs gsum la sogs pa
K12D0494_H0462:300b-22: phul te bskor ba'i thabs su bsang gtor yang byas
K12D0494_H0462:300b-23: la bdag gi rgyud las byung ba'i rdzas rnams ji
K12D0494_H0462:300b-24: srid mi skyo ba'i bar du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:300b-25: skyo bar gyur na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bltas te yang byang chub kyi sems bsgom mo //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-0: de nas mchod yon phul la lha rnams la phyag byas @301a *//
K12D0494_H0462:301a-1: te slar gshegs su gsol lo //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-2: lha rnams slar gshegs su gsol nas phyag rgya'i tshogs
K12D0494_H0462:301a-3: rnams gos gsar pas g-yogs la phyi de nyin yang
K12D0494_H0462:301a-4: snga ma bzhin du lha rnams so so'i dkyil 'khor
K12D0494_H0462:301a-5: la gnas par bsams te cho ga'i rim pa de
K12D0494_H0462:301a-6: nyid nam zhi bar gyur gyi bar du bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-7: gang zhig cho ga 'di yis su //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-8: cho ga shes pa'i sngags bsgrubs pas //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-9: le lo med par zhi byas na //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-10: zhi ba myur du thob par 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-11: zla ba phyed kyi khams ris gcig /
K12D0494_H0462:301a-12: nges pa nyid du zhi bar 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-13: rgyal po la ni zhag bcu gnyis; ;yul phyogs su ni zhag bcus so //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-14: de la zhi ba'i cho ga'i las byed pas cho ga 'di ltar spyad par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-15: gos dkar bgos shing gtsang la zhi //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-16: byang chub sems la rab tu gzhol //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-17: ku sha bting ba'i stan la nyal //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-18: de las byas pa'i gsang byed thogs //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-20: yid kyis sbyin sreg byed la 'jug /
K12D0494_H0462:301a-21: dus gsum sbyin sreg bzlas brjod kyis //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-22: zhi ba'i cho ga spyad par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-23: zhal bsil rdo rje mchog sbyin gyis //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-24: bsang gtor mi g-yo mgon gyis so //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-25: 'di ni re zhig mdor bsdus na //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-26: sbyin sreg cho gar bsgrags pa yin //
K12D0494_H0462:301a-27: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par
K12D0494_H0462:301a-28: byang chub ba rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob
K12D0494_H0462:301a-29: pa las / zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba'o //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-0: skal pa chen @301b po de nas gzhan //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-1: shin tu rgyas byed sbyin sreg kyang //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-2: ma yengs yid kyis mnyan par gyis //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-3: sngon gyi sngags la mkhas pa yis //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-4: sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyir //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-5: phan par 'dod pas bshad par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-6: de bas rnam pa thams cad du //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-7: rgyas pa'i cho ga spyad par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-8: grong ngam yang na ljongs dag gi /
K12D0494_H0462:301b-9: shar gyi phyogs su gnas bcas nas //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-10: snga ma bzhin du nges pa yi //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-11: sa gzhi legs par brtag par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-12: ri yi rtse'am phyugs lhas sam //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-13: mchod rten ring bsrel can dag tu //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-14: rgyas pa'i las ni sgrub byed pa'i //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-15: dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bri //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-16: mkhas pas las kyi cho ga yis //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-17: sa ni legs par brkos nas su //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-18: dbus su rin chen bzhag pa ni //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-20: der yang sa ni ser po yis //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-21: sa gzhi legs par dgang bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-22: mnyam zhing legs par bcags nas su //
K12D0494_H0462:301b-24: 'dir yang sngags pa mkhas pas rdo rje mchog sbyin
K12D0494_H0462:301b-25: rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pas de'i gsang sngags
K12D0494_H0462:301b-26: dang phyag rgyas bdag byin gyis brlabs la 'phags pa
K12D0494_H0462:301b-27: mi g-yo bas mtshams gcad pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:301b-29: zla ba yar ngo'i tshes gsum mam; lnga'am /
K12D0494_H0462:301b-31: yang na zla ba nya la yang rung ste /
K12D0494_H0462:301b-32: gza' ba bzang po gza' lhag gam /
K12D0494_H0462:302a-1: bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen por byin gyis
K12D0494_H0462:302a-2: brlabs te srad bu ser po blangs la grangs dang
K12D0494_H0462:302a-3: tshad sngar bstan pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi thig
K12D0494_H0462:302a-4: gdab bo // de nas dkyil 'khor bskor te nang
K12D0494_H0462:302a-5: du zhugs la bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi
K12D0494_H0462:302a-6: pha rol tu phyin pa bklags la phyag byas te
K12D0494_H0462:302a-7: gdab bo // / yang rnam par snang mdzad du
K12D0494_H0462:302a-8: bdag byin gyis brlabs te tshon rtsi ser po blangs
K12D0494_H0462:302a-9: gdab bo // / la / der ni yi ge ka bzhag pa //
K12D0494_H0462:302a-10: de tshe thub pa gser thub ni //
K12D0494_H0462:302a-11: gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas //
K12D0494_H0462:302a-12: ting 'dzin gnas shing sdig bcom pa'o //
K12D0494_H0462:302a-13: de nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi rta babs can du bril nub phyogs kyi sgo rtag tu dbye'o //
K12D0494_H0462:302a-14: phyi rol tu ri mo gru bzhi pa gsum gyis
K12D0494_H0462:302a-15: bskor la dkyil 'khor du lha rnams dgod pa snga
K12D0494_H0462:302a-19: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i gnas su kun tu
K12D0494_H0462:302a-20: bzang po rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya
K12D0494_H0462:302a-21: yi ge sa dang bcas par gzhag go /

K12D0494_H0462:302b-14: logs kho ra khor yug dang gra thams cad du

K12D0494_H0462:303a-1: sbyin du byin gyis brlabs te bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:303a-2: 'dir byug spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i khyad par bshad par bya ste /
K12D0494_H0462:303a-3: gur gum ga pur bsres pa ni //
K12D0494_H0462:303a-4: rgyas pa dag la byug spos mchog /
K12D0494_H0462:303a-5: dri zhim kha dog ser po dang //
K12D0494_H0462:303a-6: de ma rnyed na sbyar bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:303a-7: me tog tsam pa rab tu bzang //
K12D0494_H0462:303a-8: yu ti sna ma ser po dang //
K12D0494_H0462:303a-9: de las gzhan pa'ang dri zhim pa //

K12D0494_H0462:303a-13: bdug spos mkhas pas dbul bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:303a-14: gu gul dang ni tsandan yang //

K12D0494_H0462:303a-19: yang na kham pa ser po'ang rung //

K12D0494_H0462:303a-28: shing tog bag tshos de bzhin no //

K12D0494_H0462:303a-30: de bzhin 'bras dang dur ba'i rtsva //
K12D0494_H0462:303a-31: snod kyang ser por blugs pa dag /
K12D0494_H0462:303a-32: rgyas pa la ni mchod yon shis //
K12D0494_H0462:303a-33: de ltar mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
K12D0494_H0462:303b-0: de nas rdo rje mchog sbyin du bdag @303b byin
K12D0494_H0462:303b-1: gyis brlabs la phyi rol tu byung ste phyogs kyi
K12D0494_H0462:303b-3: de nas nye reg byas te nang du zhugs la
K12D0494_H0462:303b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas te me'i thab
K12D0494_H0462:303b-5: khung gi drung du bsreg par bya ba la sogs

K12D0494_H0462:303b-8: padma'i skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la bdag nyid
K12D0494_H0462:303b-9: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i skur bsams te khang
K12D0494_H0462:303b-10: pa'i nang byug spos ser pos zhugs thabs bskus te
K12D0494_H0462:303b-11: me tog ser po'i sil ma yang bkram la rtsva

K12D0494_H0462:303b-14: au dum pa ras me sbar la de nas me'i
K12D0494_H0462:303b-15: thab khung gi zhabs su dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor
K12D0494_H0462:303b-16: bsams te / der yi ge ya klad kor dang bcas par padma la gnas pa bsam mo //

K12D0494_H0462:303b-19: gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i thor tshugs can /
K12D0494_H0462:303b-20: mig gsum pa; gdong bzhi pa /

K12D0494_H0462:303b-29: mthu chen po dang ldan pa /
K12D0494_H0462:304a-1: zer las byung ba de lta bu'i me bsams te /

K12D0494_H0462:304a-4: mchod yon dbul ba byas la byug spos dang /

K12D0494_H0462:304a-17: te snying po de dang des sreg blugs gsum dbul
K12D0494_H0462:304a-18: lo // de nas sangs rgyas thams cad bsams te

K12D0494_H0462:304a-20: su bsams te snga ma bzhin du sreg blugs gsum

K12D0494_H0462:305a-0: @305a *// brtse bar gyur pa'i thugs kyis gsungs //

K12D0494_H0462:305b-8: mkhas pas rigs kyi bdag pos byas //
K12D0494_H0462:305b-9: lhag ma rnams ni ci rigs par //

K12D0494_H0462:306a-0: shing k'a ra b'i ra'i me bus la de bzhin du @306a *//

K12D0494_H0462:306b-1: byug cing me tog dmar po'i sil ma dgram mo
K12D0494_H0462:306b-2: // dpal ldan gos ni dmar po bgos //

K12D0494_H0462:306b-14: gang zhig cho ga 'di yis su //
