K12D0494_H0462:306b-20: de bzhin sa 'og bu mo dag /
K12D0494_H0462:306b-21: sngags pas myur du khugs par 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:306b-22: 'di ni re zhig mdor bsdus te //
K12D0494_H0462:306b-23: dbang gi sbyin sreg bsgrags pa yin //
K12D0494_H0462:306b-24: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par
K12D0494_H0462:306b-25: byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis rlob
K12D0494_H0462:306b-26: pa las / dbang du bya ba'i sbyin sreg rim par phye ba'o ////
K12D0494_H0462:306b-27: da ni drag shul spyod pa yi //
K12D0494_H0462:306b-28: cho ga ma lus bshad par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:306b-29: gnod sbyin lto 'phye yi dvags gtum; ;lha min dri za mi'am ci //
K12D0494_H0462:306b-30: sems can rnams la gnod byed dang //
K12D0494_H0462:306b-31: de bzhin bgegs dang log 'dren dang //
K12D0494_H0462:306b-32: 'byung po ma mo srin po dang //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-2: mi yang rgyags dregs mthu ldan zhing //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-3: drag po'i las byed sdang ba'ang rung //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-4: de dag gdul phyir sngags shes pas //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-5: drag shul las ni brtsam par bya; ;nyes pa chung ngu dag la ni //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-6: drag po'i cho ga mi brtsam mo //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-7: grong gi lho yi phyogs su ni //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-8: brtul bas sa gzhi nag po la //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-9: dur khrod dben pa'am dgon pa'am //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-10: skyed mos tshal rnying zhi gnas su //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-11: mar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad dam //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-12: yang na tshes ni bcu bzhi la //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-13: gza' ni spen pa mig dmar dang //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-14: rgyu skar rlung las byung ba dang //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-15: me bzhi dang ni nag pa dang //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-16: tha skar dang ni de bzhin dbo //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-17: nab so dang ni sa ri dang //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-18: rgyu skar de dag drag po ste //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-19: de dag gang yang rung ba la //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-20: sngags pa khros pa gshin rje'i bzhin //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-22: dgra yi srog ni gcod byed pa'i //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-23: sngags pa bdag nyid rang gi rgyas //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-24: rdo rje sems dpar byin brlabs te //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-25: sngags la 'jigs pa med pa yis //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-26: sa gzhi snga ma bzhin du sbyang //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-27: de nas mi g-yo mthu chen gyis //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-28: yongs su bzung la sogs byas nas //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-29: rang gi yi ge phyag rgya yis //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-30: de nas rnam snang mdzad du bya //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-31: bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi; ;srad bu sngon po der blangs nas //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-32: dkyil 'khor nan tan thig gdab pa //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-33: gru gsum phyi rol zlum por bya //
K12D0494_H0462:307a-34: khru bzhi khru lnga khru brgyad dam //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-0: de bzhin bcu gnyis @307b bcu drug khru //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-1: ji ltar las kyi rjes mthun par //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-2: mkhas pas tshad ni brtag par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-3: de nas dur khrod thal ba'am //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-4: mkhas pas tshon rtsi nag po la //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-5: yi ge ha ni der gzhag la //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-7: dus mtha'i me ltar 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-8: dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra ba'i mdog /
K12D0494_H0462:307b-9: kha ni mche ba gtsigs pa la //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-10: lag na rdo rje cod pan can; ;bdud kyi sde ni thams cad dang //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-11: sdang ba thams cad bsdigs byed pa //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-12: tshon la mkhas pas tshon de la //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-13: de 'dra'i yi ge bzhag nas ni //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-14: shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri; ;ba dan mang po'i mtshan mas mtshan //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-15: rta babs dang ni sgo khyud bcas //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-16: sgo yi cha ni legs par phye //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-17: lha yi gtso bor bzhag pa ni //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-18: snga ma bzhin du brtag par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-19: byang phyogs sgo ni phye nas su //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-20: lhag ma'i sgo rnams gcad par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:307b-21: de la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i gnas su
K12D0494_H0462:307b-22: khro bo'i rgyal ba gshin rje'i gshed gsal shing gi
K12D0494_H0462:307b-23: phyag rgyar bri'o // mdzod spu'i gnas su khro bo'i
K12D0494_H0462:307b-24: rgyal po 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes
K12D0494_H0462:307b-25: bya ba rdo rje dang dgra sta'i phyag rgyar bri'o
K12D0494_H0462:307b-26: phyag rgyar bri'o // // mthu chen thob dang /
K12D0494_H0462:307b-28: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gnas rnams su don yod zhags pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:307b-30: rta mgrin rnams zhags pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:308a-0: rdo rje be con gyi phyag rgya @308a *//
K12D0494_H0462:308a-1: rnams su go rim bzhin du gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:308a-2: gnod mdzes kyi gnas su khro zla gtso bo'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gzhag go /
K12D0494_H0462:308a-3: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba yang be con gyi phyag rgyar gzhag go /
K12D0494_H0462:308a-6: mngon du phyogs pa gnyis be con gyi phyag rgyar gzhag go /
K12D0494_H0462:308a-7: gnas gtsang ma ba rnams kyi gnas su gshin rje'i 'chi bdag dang /
K12D0494_H0462:308a-8: dus mtshan mo dang lhan cig tu gzhag go /
K12D0494_H0462:308a-9: bden bral yang ral gri'i phyag rgyar gzhag go /
K12D0494_H0462:308a-10: 'khor sa'i dbus su me'i thab khung sgo la phyogs par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:308a-11: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol khor khor yug tu ba dan rnams bri'o //
K12D0494_H0462:308a-13: dbang gi las kyi me'i thab khung bzhin du bya ste /
K12D0494_H0462:308a-14: bye brag tu ni phyi rol gyi mu ran zlum
K12D0494_H0462:308a-15: por byas la ba dan mang pos mtshan par bya'o
K12D0494_H0462:308a-16: // dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams snga ma bzhin du
K12D0494_H0462:308a-17: so so'i gzugs bsams te mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o
K12D0494_H0462:308a-18: // // de nas lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin
K12D0494_H0462:308a-19: du mchod nas de nas bdag phyag na rdo rjer
K12D0494_H0462:308a-20: byin gyis brlabs la phyi rol tu phyogs kyi gtor
K12D0494_H0462:308a-21: ma snga ma bzhin du sbyin no //
K12D0494_H0462:308a-22: de la byug spos la sogs pa'i khyad par ni /
K12D0494_H0462:308b-0: du ru ska dang @308b sol ba bsres pa'i byug spos nag por dbul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:308b-1: me tog autpa la mthing ga dang /
K12D0494_H0462:308b-2: aa ba r'a dzi ta mthing ga'am /
K12D0494_H0462:308b-3: gzhan yang me tog sngon po rnams dbul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:308b-5: sra rtsi bog bu ram dang sbyar ba dbul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:308b-7: yungs kar mar tsha ba snying po sngon po can mar me'i snod nag po'i nang du dbul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:308b-11: kha ba la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang /
K12D0494_H0462:308b-12: tshod ma kha dog nag po rnams dbul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:308b-17: rjen pa rnams phyogs kyi gtor mar sbyin no; ;gtor
K12D0494_H0462:308b-18: ma'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas
K12D0494_H0462:308b-20: dur khrod nas me blangs te khro bo'i rgyal pos
K12D0494_H0462:308b-21: bsang gtor byas la dur khrod kyi shing ngam shing
K12D0494_H0462:308b-22: bal ta ka'am / ba ru ra'i shing gis me
K12D0494_H0462:308b-23: bus la rnam par snang mjed chen por bdag byin
K12D0494_H0462:308b-24: gyis brlabs te me'i thab khung gi zhabs su rlung
K12D0494_H0462:308b-25: gi dkyil 'khor bsams la der yi ge h'um gzhag
K12D0494_H0462:308b-26: bal ta ka'am / go / yi ge h'um de las me'i gzugs su gyur par bsams pa ni /
K12D0494_H0462:308b-27: kha dog nag po shin tu mi bzad pa /
K12D0494_H0462:308b-31: blta dka' ba kham pa thor tshugs dud ka can /
K12D0494_H0462:308b-32: char sprin sngon po lta bu'i mdangs can /
K12D0494_H0462:308b-33: gsus po che gos sngon po gyon pa /
K12D0494_H0462:308b-34: srad bu sngon po'i se ral khar thogs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:309a-2: khro ba dang bcas shing kha gdangs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:309a-7: snying ga na sum mdo'i ris mtshan can /
K12D0494_H0462:309a-9: gdong khro gnyer bsnyer ba dang /
K12D0494_H0462:309a-10: h'um dang bcas pa 'bar ba nag cing rtsub pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:309a-11: zangs lta bu'i 'od 'phro ba'i 'phreng ba can /
K12D0494_H0462:309a-12: 'jigs pa'i dus mngon du byung ba bzhin du 'dug
K12D0494_H0462:309a-13: pa de lta bu'i me bsams nas bsang gtor byas
K12D0494_H0462:309a-14: te byug spos la sogs pa rang gi rig sngags
K12D0494_H0462:309a-15: kyis dbul lo // aom aagne ye dz'a hi tra tra h'um phat/
K12D0494_H0462:309a-16: de nas yungs mar tsha ba dang sbyar ba'i kri sa ra'i sreg blugs gsum byin la dug dang /
K12D0494_H0462:309a-18: ske tshe'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin no //
K12D0494_H0462:309a-19: yang na shing ba la ta ka dang /
K12D0494_H0462:309a-20: ba ru ra'i shing gi yam shing rtse mo rnon por gzhogs pa yungs mar tsha ba dang /
K12D0494_H0462:309a-21: ske tshes byugs pa sbyin no //
K12D0494_H0462:309a-22: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs pa'i
K12D0494_H0462:309a-23: lha rnams snga ma bzhin du bsams te rdzas de
K12D0494_H0462:309a-24: dag nyid las rang gi rig pas sreg blugs dbul
K12D0494_H0462:309a-25: lo // de nas rang gi lha rnams snga ma bzhin du bsams te bzhag la /
K12D0494_H0462:309a-26: rang gi rig pa las byung ba'i rdzas ji lta
K12D0494_H0462:309a-27: ba bzhin du mdzub mo dang mthe bos bzung ste
K12D0494_H0462:309a-28: khro bo dang bcas par gsang sngags zlos shing phad
K12D0494_H0462:309a-29: dang bcas par ji srid 'dod pa de srid du
K12D0494_H0462:309b-1: de nas snga ma bzhin du byang chub kyi sems sgom pa la sogs pas ngal bso bar bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-2: sngags pa gang zhig 'di lta bu'i //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-3: rab tu drag po'i las byed pa //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-4: de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-5: gnas kyang rtsva mchog bzhin du sreg /
K12D0494_H0462:309b-7: dpal ldan gos ni sngon po bgos //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-8: byug spos phreng ba sngon pos brgyan //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-9: srad bu sngon po'i se ral thogs //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-10: byang chub sems la rab tu gzhol //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-11: tsha dang kha dang bska ba dang //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-12: kri sa ra yi kha zas za //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-13: lha rnams dgod pa'i don la mkhas //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-14: gtsang zhing mchog tu tshul khrims ldan //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-15: spro ba che zhing dpa' snying can //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-16: khros pa 'jig rten mthar byed bzhin //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-17: lho phyogs kha bltas mi smra zhing //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-19: sbyin sreg bzlas la rtag tu 'bad //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-20: srung dang bskyab pa dag la mkhas //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-21: mtshan mo sbyin sreg byed pa yis //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-22: drag shul spyod pa brtsam par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:309b-23: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par
K12D0494_H0462:309b-24: byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob
K12D0494_H0462:309b-25: pa las / drag shul spyad pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba'o ////
K12D0494_H0462:309b-26: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
K12D0494_H0462:309b-27: kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams
K12D0494_H0462:309b-28: la stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul
K12D0494_H0462:310a-0: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i snying po @310a *//
K12D0494_H0462:310a-1: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'thob pa'i rgyu spros pa thams cad dang bral pa /
K12D0494_H0462:310a-4: yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K12D0494_H0462:310a-5: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos bshad do //
K12D0494_H0462:310a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0494_H0462:310a-7: snying rje chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug
K12D0494_H0462:310a-8: de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ting
K12D0494_H0462:310a-9: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang ba pa'i
K12D0494_H0462:310a-10: bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa /
K12D0494_H0462:310a-12: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul stong pa nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:310a-13: gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub stsol ba /
K12D0494_H0462:310a-14: gnas med pa; mtshan nyid med pa /
K12D0494_H0462:310a-16: mtshan gyi gzhi dang mtshan nyid las 'das pa /
K12D0494_H0462:310a-17: theg pa chen po thob par byed pa /
K12D0494_H0462:310a-18: bdud rtsi sbyin pa de sngags kyi tshul la rnam
K12D0494_H0462:310a-19: par gnas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa rnams kyis ji
K12D0494_H0462:310a-21: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:310a-22: gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje /
K12D0494_H0462:310a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba ston
K12D0494_H0462:310a-24: pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal
K12D0494_H0462:310a-25: du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
K12D0494_H0462:310b-0: @310b sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la
K12D0494_H0462:310b-1: lta ba snying rje chen po byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0494_H0462:310b-2: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug de bdag la 'dri
K12D0494_H0462:310b-3: zhing mchis na / bcom ldan 'das; 'gro ba la phan par byed pa /
K12D0494_H0462:310b-4: theg pa chen po thob par byed pa /
K12D0494_H0462:310b-5: mtshan nyid med cing gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul /
K12D0494_H0462:310b-6: gsang sngags thams cad kyi tshul gyi dngos grub stsol ba /
K12D0494_H0462:310b-7: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i ngo bo nyid /
K12D0494_H0462:310b-8: chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su zhugs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:310b-9: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung bar byed pa;
K12D0494_H0462:310b-10: stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi spyod yul
K12D0494_H0462:310b-12: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:310b-13: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs
K12D0494_H0462:310b-14: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
K12D0494_H0462:310b-15: rgyas theg pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa
K12D0494_H0462:310b-16: / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mdzad pa /
K12D0494_H0462:310b-17: rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba /
K12D0494_H0462:310b-18: sems can thams cad la dgongs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:310b-19: gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub stsol ba /
K12D0494_H0462:310b-20: bgegs thams cad skrag par mdzad pa /
K12D0494_H0462:310b-22: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
K12D0494_H0462:311a-4: rnam par shes pa med pa /
K12D0494_H0462:311a-9: ma 'dres pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0494_H0462:311a-10: chos gang rgyu las byung ba rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:311a-11: de'i rgyu'ang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
K12D0494_H0462:311a-12: de rnams kyi ni 'gog pa'ang gsungs //
K12D0494_H0462:311a-13: de skad gsungs pa dge sbyong mchog /
K12D0494_H0462:311a-14: gzhan dbang yod pa ma yin zhing //
K12D0494_H0462:311a-15: yongs su grub pa'ang gzhan yin no; ;gnyis po'ang yod pa ma yin te //
K12D0494_H0462:311a-16: rnam shes brgyad po de nyid mtshan //
K12D0494_H0462:311a-17: de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de rnams so
K12D0494_H0462:311a-18: so'i ye shes mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdzu 'phrul
K12D0494_H0462:311a-19: gyi mthus bsam pa tha dad pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:311a-20: blo gros tha dad pas tshigs su bcad pa gnyis
K12D0494_H0462:311a-21: gsungs pa'i don ji ltar rjes su mthun par khong
K12D0494_H0462:311a-22: du chud nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis
K12D0494_H0462:311a-23: bcom ldan 'das / legs so legs so zhes gsol nas legs par phul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:311a-24: gsang sngags tshul la legs gnas pa //
K12D0494_H0462:311a-25: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa yis //
K12D0494_H0462:311a-26: yang dag nyid ni sgom byed do //
K12D0494_H0462:311a-27: de dag sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:311a-28: de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
K12D0494_H0462:311b-0: chen @311b po 'phags pa sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
K12D0494_H0462:311b-1: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis
K12D0494_H0462:311b-2: brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
K12D0494_H0462:311b-3: to // rnam par rtog pa las 'das pa'i //
K12D0494_H0462:311b-4: ma 'dres sems ni nyid kyis kyang //
K12D0494_H0462:311b-5: bzlas pas dngos grub thob 'gyur na //
K12D0494_H0462:311b-6: chos kyi 'dus byas ci zhig smos //

K12D0494_H0462:325b-19: zungs shig dang ngas khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0494_H0462:325b-20: thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa
K12D0494_H0462:325b-21: la 'jug pa sgrub pa'i tshul rnam par dag pas
K12D0494_H0462:325b-22: mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'i
K12D0494_H0462:325b-23: gzhi chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams
K12D0494_H0462:325b-24: cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par
K12D0494_H0462:325b-28: zhes gsol nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:325b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0494_H0462:326a-2: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o //
K12D0494_H0462:326a-3: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gzhi ni /
K12D0494_H0462:326a-4: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o //
K12D0494_H0462:326a-5: mtshan nyid med pa'i gzhi ni /
K12D0494_H0462:326a-6: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o //
K12D0494_H0462:326a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhi ni /
K12D0494_H0462:326a-8: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o //
K12D0494_H0462:326a-9: de ltar mngon par byang chub pa'i gzhi 'di dag byang chub sems dpas bsgom par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:326a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so so yang
K12D0494_H0462:326a-13: dag par rig pa la 'jug pa sgrub pa'i tshul
K12D0494_H0462:326a-14: rnam par dag pas mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i
K12D0494_H0462:326a-15: gzhi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no //
K12D0494_H0462:326a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
K12D0494_H0462:326a-17: chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rab 'byams mtha' yas
K12D0494_H0462:326a-18: pa byin gyis brlabs nas nam mkha' dri ma med
K12D0494_H0462:326a-19: pa'i rgyal po rnam par smin pa nam mkha' ltar
K12D0494_H0462:326a-20: rgya che zhing mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting
K12D0494_H0462:326a-21: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12D0494_H0462:326a-22: bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de
K12D0494_H0462:326a-23: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul snang ba yul
K12D0494_H0462:326a-24: bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab 'byams ston pa zhes
K12D0494_H0462:326a-25: bya ba'i 'od zer chen po dbu'i gtsug nas byung
K12D0494_H0462:326a-26: ngo // byung nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rjes su mthun par bstan te /
K12D0494_H0462:326b-0: bcom ldan 'das rnam par @326b mjad la bskor ba
K12D0494_H0462:326b-1: lan brgya stong du ma byas nas 'jig rten gyi
K12D0494_H0462:326b-2: khams rnam pa bcur snang ba chen pos gsal bar
K12D0494_H0462:326b-3: byas te steng gi nam mkha' la gnas nas dam
K12D0494_H0462:326b-4: tshig chen po gsum gyis snang bas 'jig rten gyi
K12D0494_H0462:326b-5: khams nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa snang bar
K12D0494_H0462:326b-6: byas nas sems can gyi khams rnams la dam tshig
K12D0494_H0462:326b-7: chen po gsum gyi myu gu skye bar byin gyis
K12D0494_H0462:326b-8: brlabs te 'od zer de dag nam mkha' la lhags
K12D0494_H0462:326b-9: nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor lhung ngo //
K12D0494_H0462:326b-10: 'od zer de dag phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor
K12D0494_H0462:326b-11: lhung ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la gsang
K12D0494_H0462:326b-12: ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin
K12D0494_H0462:326b-13: gshegs pa'i yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
K12D0494_H0462:326b-14: 'dzin chen po thob par gyur te /
K12D0494_H0462:326b-15: de thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnyis su med par gnas par gyur to //
K12D0494_H0462:326b-16: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo
K12D0494_H0462:326b-17: rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi dga' bas
K12D0494_H0462:326b-18: snying tshim par gyur nas mig gnyis mi 'dzum par
K12D0494_H0462:326b-19: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yud tsam
K12D0494_H0462:326b-20: zhig bltas te bzhin cung zad 'dzum zhing bcom ldan
K12D0494_H0462:326b-22: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lags //
K12D0494_H0462:326b-23: ji ltar rgyal ba dam pa lags //
K12D0494_H0462:326b-24: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' lags; ;ji ltar sangs rgyas zhes kyang bgyi //
K12D0494_H0462:326b-25: mgon po bdag gi the tshom 'di //
K12D0494_H0462:326b-26: thub pa chen pos bsal du gsol //
K12D0494_H0462:326b-27: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:327a-2: spyad pa'i rgyal po theg chen la //
K12D0494_H0462:327a-3: rgyal ba'i sras ni spyod par 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:327a-4: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12D0494_H0462:327a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag
K12D0494_H0462:327a-6: na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to
K12D0494_H0462:327a-8: khyod don 'di lta bu 'dri ba de legs so legs so //
K12D0494_H0462:327a-10: chos kyi tshul sgrub pa'i gzhi 'di lta bu 'di thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur /
K12D0494_H0462:327a-11: kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni /
K12D0494_H0462:327a-14: rigs kyi bu de dag ni /
K12D0494_H0462:327a-15: sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi /
K12D0494_H0462:327a-16: sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:327a-18: de lta bas na; byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags
K12D0494_H0462:327a-19: kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
K12D0494_H0462:327a-20: pas thog ma nyid du theg pa chen po rtogs
K12D0494_H0462:327a-21: par khong du chud par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:327a-24: theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K12D0494_H0462:327a-25: tshegs chung ngus gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0494_H0462:327a-26: 'di ltar gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di ni /
K12D0494_H0462:327a-27: mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyong ba yin no //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-0: de nas yang bcom @327b ldan 'das rnam par snang
K12D0494_H0462:327b-1: mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje
K12D0494_H0462:327b-4: de'i phyir rab tu legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-5: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:327b-6: gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan to //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-7: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-8: gnyis su med cing mtshan nyid gcig /
K12D0494_H0462:327b-9: gnas ni rnam pa bcus rtogs pa //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-10: de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-11: 'du shes tsam yang spangs gyur cing //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-12: rang bzhin nyid kyang bstan du med //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-13: ye shes kyis ni rang rig pa //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-14: de ni de bzhin gshegs zhes gsungs //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-15: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-16: rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-17: gang zhig de ni rtogs 'dod pa //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-18: de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-19: sa bcu yongs su rdzogs byas nas //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-20: dbang rnams rtogs par khong du chud //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-21: chos rnams stong pa sgyu ma bzhin //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-22: gang gis 'dir ni kun rtogs shing //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-23: 'jig rten gyi ni rgyud shes pa //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-24: sangs rgyas zhes ni de la bya //
K12D0494_H0462:327b-26: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnas skabs rnam par gzhag pa ni /
K12D0494_H0462:327b-29: rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0494_H0462:327b-30: rnams kyis rang gi sems rnam par gzhag pa sgrub
K12D0494_H0462:328a-2: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo
K12D0494_H0462:328a-3: rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to
K12D0494_H0462:328a-4: // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
K12D0494_H0462:328a-5: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub
K12D0494_H0462:328a-6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la theg pa
K12D0494_H0462:328a-7: chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
K12D0494_H0462:328a-12: shin tu ngo mtshar lags so //
K12D0494_H0462:328a-14: rigs kyi bu de dag 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba
K12D0494_H0462:328a-15: na 'khor ba'i tshe ngan 'gro ngan song gi 'jigs
K12D0494_H0462:328a-16: pa'am / bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs pa'am /
K12D0494_H0462:328a-17: mi khom par skye ba'i 'jigs pa ma mchis par bdag smra'o //
K12D0494_H0462:328a-19: byang chub sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa la gnas pa ni /
K12D0494_H0462:328a-20: 'jig rten dang lhan cig tu gnas kyang 'jig rten
K12D0494_H0462:328a-21: las 'das pa'i lam mi gtong zhing sems can yongs
K12D0494_H0462:328a-22: su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs kyis 'jig rten
K12D0494_H0462:328a-23: gyi bya ba thams cad kyang ston to //
K12D0494_H0462:328a-24: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0494_H0462:328a-25: de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
K12D0494_H0462:328a-26: rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa
K12D0494_H0462:328a-28: gsang ba chen po snying po'i dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol /
K12D0494_H0462:328b-0: de ni skye bo mang @328b po la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so //
K12D0494_H0462:328b-1: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12D0494_H0462:328b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag
K12D0494_H0462:328b-3: na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to
K12D0494_H0462:328b-5: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la
K12D0494_H0462:328b-6: zungs shig dang ngas khyod la gsang ba'i snying po'i
K12D0494_H0462:328b-8: de yang re zhig slob dpon dam tshig gsum rnam
K12D0494_H0462:328b-9: par dbye ba la mkhas shing bdag kyang dam tshig
K12D0494_H0462:328b-10: gsum la gnas pa yin no //
K12D0494_H0462:328b-12: de la dam tshig gsum po de gang zhe na /
K12D0494_H0462:328b-13: chos kyi khyad par gsum ste /
K12D0494_H0462:328b-14: chos kyi khyad par gad ba dus gsum du gtogs
K12D0494_H0462:328b-15: pa'i dus na sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis 'jug
K12D0494_H0462:328b-16: pa de ni / dam tshig gsum zhes bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:328b-18: chos kyi khyad par de yang gang zhe na /
K12D0494_H0462:328b-23: de la sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thams cad
K12D0494_H0462:328b-24: med pa yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de
K12D0494_H0462:328b-25: ni / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'o //
K12D0494_H0462:328b-26: 'di la chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i rang rig pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni /
K12D0494_H0462:328b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
K12D0494_H0462:328b-28: gang lus dang ngag dang yid 'jug pa de ni /
K12D0494_H0462:328b-29: rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-0: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang @329a *//
K12D0494_H0462:329a-2: mu stegs can gzhan dag gis lta ci smos /
K12D0494_H0462:329a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-4: byis pa mi shes pas bsgrings pa //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-5: tshul 'di shes par ma gyur rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-6: sangs rgyas gzhan du tshol bar byed //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-7: 'di na gnas par yongs ma rtogs //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-8: 'jig rten khams gzhan gang nas kyang //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-9: sangs rgyas rnyed par yong mi 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-10: sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-11: sangs rgyas gzhan du ma bstan to //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-12: de lta bas na rnal 'byor pas //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-13: rtag tu yid gnyis spangs nas ni //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-14: sems kyi khyad par rnam gsum brtag /
K12D0494_H0462:329a-15: de nas dam tshig gsum shes 'gyur //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-16: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad
K12D0494_H0462:329a-17: pa de dag gsungs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po
K12D0494_H0462:329a-18: phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K12D0494_H0462:329a-20: de la slob dpon dam tshig gsum shes par bya
K12D0494_H0462:329a-21: ba la mkhas pas bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings su
K12D0494_H0462:329a-22: mos par byas la de la dmigs pa'i spyod pas
K12D0494_H0462:329a-23: sa gzhi rnam par sbyang bar bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:329a-24: de ltar des sa gzhi rnams sbyangs nas nam mkha'i
K12D0494_H0462:329a-25: dbyings lta bu la yang dag par gzhol bas bdag
K12D0494_H0462:329a-26: ni / chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa'i ye
K12D0494_H0462:329a-27: shes kyi yul yin no snyam du bdag nyid rnam
K12D0494_H0462:329a-28: par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlab bo //
K12D0494_H0462:329b-0: de ltar bdag nyid byin @329b gyis brlabs la chos
K12D0494_H0462:329b-1: kyi dbyings rnam par ngag pa'i phyir gnyis su med
K12D0494_H0462:329b-2: pa'i sbyor bas bdag gi lus dkyil 'khor yin pa'am
K12D0494_H0462:329b-3: dkyil 'khor bdag gi lus yin par byin gyis brlabs
K12D0494_H0462:329b-4: te / rang gi sems kyis byas pa'i tshon sna lnga'i phye ma dang /
K12D0494_H0462:329b-5: gzhan yang rung ste cho ga snga mas rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:329b-7: de nas sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su
K12D0494_H0462:329b-8: bskyab pa'i phyir gsang ba'i snying po'i dam tshig la
K12D0494_H0462:329b-10: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
K12D0494_H0462:329b-11: kyis byin gyi rlabs pa gang gis byang chub sems
K12D0494_H0462:329b-12: dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i
K12D0494_H0462:329b-13: spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
K12D0494_H0462:329b-14: ye shes kyang tshe 'di nyid gcig pus thob par
K12D0494_H0462:329b-15: 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi byin gyis brlab
K12D0494_H0462:329b-16: pa mdzad do // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
K12D0494_H0462:329b-17: byams pa chen po dang thugs rje chen po'i spyan
K12D0494_H0462:329b-18: gnyis kyis sems can gyi khams la gzigs nas gsang
K12D0494_H0462:329b-19: ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka'
K12D0494_H0462:329b-20: pa mdzad do // stsal pa / gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
K12D0494_H0462:329b-21: byin gyis brlabs bsgrub pa'i gzhi gang dag gis de
K12D0494_H0462:329b-22: bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
K12D0494_H0462:329b-23: thob par dka' ba yang bsod nams ma byas pa'i
K12D0494_H0462:329b-24: sems can rnams kyi pha rol gyi rgyud la yang
K12D0494_H0462:330a-0: rab tu 'jog par 'gyur ba chos kyi @330a *//
K12D0494_H0462:330a-1: dbyings kyi byin gyi brlab kyi gzhi nyon cig /
K12D0494_H0462:330a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:330a-3: phyag na rdo rjes thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0494_H0462:330a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K12D0494_H0462:330a-7: seng+ge'i sgra sgrog pa rnams kyi ye shes la mnga' ba ngo mtshar to //
K12D0494_H0462:330a-10: rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su
K12D0494_H0462:330a-11: zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di 'dra ba'i
K12D0494_H0462:330a-12: don du nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i bskal
K12D0494_H0462:330a-13: par yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad
K12D0494_H0462:330a-14: pa yang bzod par mi bgyid /
K12D0494_H0462:330a-17: rigs kyi bu mkhas pa 'di la slob par 'tshal
K12D0494_H0462:330a-18: bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab par bgyi'o
K12D0494_H0462:330a-22: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi
K12D0494_H0462:330a-23: dbyings kyi byin gyis brlab kyi gzhi de dag bshad
K12D0494_H0462:330a-24: du gsol / de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12D0494_H0462:330a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag
K12D0494_H0462:330a-26: na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to
K12D0494_H0462:330a-28: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang mtshungs pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni /
K12D0494_H0462:330b-0: chos @330b kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni /
K12D0494_H0462:330b-1: stong pa nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mtshan nyid do //
K12D0494_H0462:330b-3: gang dag ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad ba
K12D0494_H0462:330b-4: spyod pa na byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug
K12D0494_H0462:330b-5: gi bar du bsgoms shing lan mang du byas pa'i
K12D0494_H0462:330b-6: chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlab kyi gzhi yin
K12D0494_H0462:330b-7: te / gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
K12D0494_H0462:330b-8: de lta bas na; de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
K12D0494_H0462:330b-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K12D0494_H0462:330b-12: nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa na

K12D0494_H0462:335b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang ba pa'i bdag @335b po
K12D0494_H0462:335b-1: phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
K12D0494_H0462:335b-2: to // gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
K12D0494_H0462:335b-3: de la byang chub gang zhe na /
K12D0494_H0462:335b-6: nam mkha' la yang gzugs med /
K12D0494_H0462:335b-9: byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa sems kyi mtshan nyid kyang de yin no //
K12D0494_H0462:335b-12: sems dang nam mkha' dang byang chub 'di dag ni /
K12D0494_H0462:335b-14: de la chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa
K12D0494_H0462:335b-15: chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa gang yin pa
K12D0494_H0462:335b-16: de ni / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin no //
K12D0494_H0462:335b-17: de la mi skye ba'i tshul dang /
K12D0494_H0462:335b-18: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems skye ba gang yin pa de ni /
K12D0494_H0462:335b-22: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gnas kyi gzhi lngas byang chub mngon par rtogs par 'gyur te /

K12D0494_H0462:335b-26: cad dang bral bar mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro

K12D0494_H0462:336a-0: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub @336a *//

K12D0494_H0462:336a-6: chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rang gi
K12D0494_H0462:336a-7: sems thog ma nas ma skyes pa stong ba nyid
K12D0494_H0462:336a-8: kyi ngo bo nyid du rtogs par bya'o //

K12D0494_H0462:336a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la bdag gam /
K12D0494_H0462:336a-13: skye ba'i shad las skyes pa yod pa ma yin gyi /
K12D0494_H0462:336a-16: skye mched tsam du zad do //
K12D0494_H0462:336a-17: zhes 'jig rten pa'i lam yongs su spangs par bstan pa yin no //
K12D0494_H0462:336a-22: 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba ni /
K12D0494_H0462:336a-23: nyan thos kyi lam mngon par rtogs pa yongs su
K12D0494_H0462:336a-24: shes pa'i sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
K12D0494_H0462:336a-25: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa rnam par
K12D0494_H0462:336a-27: chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis ni /
K12D0494_H0462:336a-28: byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang
K12D0494_H0462:336a-29: chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams rang gi
K12D0494_H0462:336a-30: sems thog ma nas ma skyes par mthong zhing stong
K12D0494_H0462:336a-31: pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rdzas med pa mtshan
K12D0494_H0462:336a-32: nyid med par mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0494_H0462:336b-0: byang @336b chub sems dpa' gnas med pa sgrib pa
K12D0494_H0462:336b-1: med pa spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems
K12D0494_H0462:336b-2: bskyed bar bya'o // gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
K12D0494_H0462:336b-3: rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar theg pa chen po
K12D0494_H0462:336b-4: la yang dag par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0494_H0462:336b-5: rnams la gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul sgrub pa rnam
K12D0494_H0462:336b-6: par thar pa'i sgo ma gtogs par bla na med
K12D0494_H0462:336b-7: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phan
K12D0494_H0462:336b-8: 'dogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:336b-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskal pa du mar 'bad
K12D0494_H0462:336b-11: cing brtsal te gtang dka' ba rnams kyang byas pas
K12D0494_H0462:336b-12: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
K12D0494_H0462:336b-13: te / byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo
K12D0494_H0462:336b-14: nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams
K12D0494_H0462:336b-15: kyi tshe 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang
K12D0494_H0462:336b-16: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
K12D0494_H0462:336b-18: de yang de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K12D0494_H0462:336b-20: tshe zhes bya ba de ni /
K12D0494_H0462:336b-21: de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba la 'du shes su bya bar zad de /
K12D0494_H0462:336b-22: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis 'du shes de
K12D0494_H0462:336b-23: yang chos thams cad gyi ngo bo nyid khong du
K12D0494_H0462:336b-24: chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i sngon rol nyid
K12D0494_H0462:336b-26: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
K12D0494_H0462:336b-27: kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje
K12D0494_H0462:337a-1: rgya'i dam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di lnga ni /
K12D0494_H0462:337a-2: rgyang ring du spang bar bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:337a-5: sems can la gnod pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:337a-8: gsang sngags la sogs pa la ma gus pa ste /
K12D0494_H0462:337a-11: byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la 'jig rten
K12D0494_H0462:337a-12: las 'das pa'i lam la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams
K12D0494_H0462:337a-13: kyis rgyang ring du spang par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:337a-15: chos 'di rnams la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0494_H0462:337a-16: de la byang chub kyi spyad pa cung zad kyang
K12D0494_H0462:337a-17: yongs su rdzogs par nga mi smra'o //
K12D0494_H0462:337a-21: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi bar du gcod pa chen po'o //
K12D0494_H0462:337a-22: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo
K12D0494_H0462:337a-23: rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to
K12D0494_H0462:337a-25: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gsang ba'i
K12D0494_H0462:337a-26: snying po 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par gyur pa
K12D0494_H0462:337a-27: de'i bsod nams ci zhig 'phel bar 'gyur /
K12D0494_H0462:337a-28: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:337a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bkar stsal to //
K12D0494_H0462:337a-31: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' ni /
K12D0494_H0462:337b-1: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad ma mchis pas de'i tshad gzung bar mi nus so //
K12D0494_H0462:337b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0494_H0462:337b-3: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' ni /
K12D0494_H0462:337b-4: rtogs par nus kyang srid kyi /
K12D0494_H0462:337b-5: gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig mthong
K12D0494_H0462:337b-6: ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams
K12D0494_H0462:337b-7: mngon par 'du byas pa gang yin pa'i bsod nams
K12D0494_H0462:337b-8: de'i tshad ni / rtogs par mi nus so //
K12D0494_H0462:337b-15: snying po gtso bo thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa ste /
K12D0494_H0462:337b-16: de'i gong na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po med do //
K12D0494_H0462:337b-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa /
K12D0494_H0462:337b-18: gnas su gyur pa; skyabs su gyur pa'o //
K12D0494_H0462:337b-21: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dkyil 'khor dang
K12D0494_H0462:337b-22: phyag rgya dang dam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod
K12D0494_H0462:337b-23: pas dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig la
K12D0494_H0462:337b-25: gang dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams me ma mur
K12D0494_H0462:337b-26: gyis yongs su gang ba la yang rkang pa gnyis
K12D0494_H0462:337b-28: byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang
K12D0494_H0462:337b-29: chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de rnams la
K12D0494_H0462:337b-30: yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag
K12D0494_H0462:338a-0: gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi @338a *//
K12D0494_H0462:338a-5: gang la brten nas sems can dmyal ba rgyun chad
K12D0494_H0462:338a-6: par 'gyur zhing dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'gro ba
K12D0494_H0462:338a-7: dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i phung po med
K12D0494_H0462:338a-8: par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi
K12D0494_H0462:338a-9: sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
K12D0494_H0462:338a-10: de dag la ji ltar lan ldon par 'gyur /
K12D0494_H0462:338a-11: byang chub sems dpa' de dag mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la gnas pa /
K12D0494_H0462:338a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12D0494_H0462:338a-13: nam mkha' ltar gnas pa med pa'i spyod yul can du rig par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:338a-15: ngas khyod la bsgo bar bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:338a-17: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi blun bo dmigs pa can la lta ba /
K12D0494_H0462:338a-20: blo phyin ci log tu gyur pa /
K12D0494_H0462:338a-21: bdag gi sems kyi gnas gtan la ma phebs pa
K12D0494_H0462:338a-22: rnams rnam par 'khrul nas 'di skad du 'di ni
K12D0494_H0462:338a-23: / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi /
K12D0494_H0462:338a-25: rang bzo can gyis rang bzor byas pa yin no //
K12D0494_H0462:338a-26: zhes zer ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0494_H0462:338a-28: mi blun po de dag ni /
K12D0494_H0462:338a-29: 'gro ba gnyis su 'gro bar rig par bya ste /
K12D0494_H0462:338b-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu cung zad kyang yod par nga mi smra'o //
K12D0494_H0462:338b-7: rtsa ba chad par byed pa la zhugs te sangs
K12D0494_H0462:338b-8: rgyas kyi byang chub la bar du gcod par byed
K12D0494_H0462:338b-9: pa / bdud kyis zil gyis non pa /
K12D0494_H0462:338b-10: shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can /
K12D0494_H0462:338b-11: theg pa chen po la goms par ma byas pa /
K12D0494_H0462:338b-12: nyan thos kyi theg pa la snying por 'du shes pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0494_H0462:338b-13: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos
K12D0494_H0462:338b-14: kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par brtson par gyur
K12D0494_H0462:338b-15: pa de dag la tshul khrims 'chal ba sdig pa'i
K12D0494_H0462:338b-16: chos spyod pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi byang
K12D0494_H0462:338b-17: chub ga la yod ces smra bar 'gyur te /
K12D0494_H0462:338b-18: mi blun po de dag 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das
K12D0494_H0462:338b-19: thams cad mkhyen pa des sems can rnams la phan
K12D0494_H0462:338b-20: gdags pa'i phyir 'di dag thams cad gsungs so //

K12D0494_H0462:338b-22: de ci'i phyir zhe na; de dag ni /

K12D0494_H0462:338b-24: bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa
K12D0494_H0462:338b-26: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
K12D0494_H0462:338b-27: kyis phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje
K12D0494_H0462:338b-28: 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed
K12D0494_H0462:339a-0: rigs kyi bu de rnams bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i @339a *//
K12D0494_H0462:339a-1: phyir rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyi /
K12D0494_H0462:339a-2: rigs kyi bu de rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung bar gyis shig /
K12D0494_H0462:339a-3: yongs su bskyab par gyis shig /
K12D0494_H0462:339a-4: gnod pa las bzlog par gyis shig /
K12D0494_H0462:339a-5: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:339a-6: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin
K12D0494_H0462:339a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed pa
K12D0494_H0462:339a-8: de dag gis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces
K12D0494_H0462:339a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rjes ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o //
K12D0494_H0462:339a-11: rigs kyi bu de dag nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K12D0494_H0462:339a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0494_H0462:339a-15: khyod kyis ci nas kyang ston pa'i bstan pa 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /
K12D0494_H0462:339a-16: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo
K12D0494_H0462:339a-17: rjes rdo rje 'dzin de dag thams cad la smras
K12D0494_H0462:339a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K12D0494_H0462:339a-20: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bya dka' ba brgya
K12D0494_H0462:339a-21: stong du mar bsgrubs pa de ni /
K12D0494_H0462:339a-22: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yin te /
K12D0494_H0462:339a-23: de bas na khyed thams cad kyis nan tan bskyed la de dag srung bar gyis shig /
K12D0494_H0462:339a-26: bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin byed pa'o //
K12D0494_H0462:339b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa srung ba'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0494_H0462:339b-2: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0494_H0462:339b-3: stobs bcu 'dzin pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro; ;de
K12D0494_H0462:339b-4: bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang
K12D0494_H0462:339b-5: / bskyab pa dang sba ba'i phyir bdag cag rnams kyis rtag tu brtson par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:339b-6: rigs kyi bu de dag kyang bsrung ba dang /
K12D0494_H0462:339b-7: bskyab pa'i dang; sba pa'i phyir brtson par bya'o //
K12D0494_H0462:339b-8: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12D0494_H0462:339b-9: rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag gis mgrin gcig tu smras pa /
K12D0494_H0462:339b-10: bdag gis ci nas kyang ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0494_H0462:339b-11: 'jig par mi 'gyur ba bya ba 'di ni /
K12D0494_H0462:339b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
K12D0494_H0462:339b-15: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba la gzigs nas chos kyi
K12D0494_H0462:339b-16: rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i
K12D0494_H0462:339b-17: phyir thugs rje chen po thog mar byas nas gsang
K12D0494_H0462:339b-18: sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsungs so //
K12D0494_H0462:339b-19: na ma stree ya dhi k'a n'am/
K12D0494_H0462:339b-20: sarba ta th'a ga ta n'am; sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma t'a ga ti ga te /
K12D0494_H0462:339b-21: ae ka dharm'a sambha sarba sa ra ni bi tsi tra r'u pa dha ra ni /
K12D0494_H0462:339b-22: sarbba sa ta tra aa bhi pra ya ba ri p'u ra ni /
K12D0494_H0462:339b-23: sarbba bo dhi sa ta tra ga t'a ma na se /
K12D0494_H0462:339b-24: tra hi mam sarbba dharma sa ma; ma h'a ma h'i bee ro tsa na garbha sam buddh'a /
K12D0494_H0462:339b-26: aa dhishthi te tra hi te bha ga wa ti h'um/
K12D0494_H0462:340a-0: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba bcom @340a *//
K12D0494_H0462:340a-1: ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs
K12D0494_H0462:340a-2: kyis snying rje chen po mngon du byas te 'di
K12D0494_H0462:340a-3: nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma smras pa /
K12D0494_H0462:340a-4: dang po slob dpon gtsang sbra byas te chos kyi
K12D0494_H0462:340a-5: dbyings su gyur pa'i yid kyis bdag rnam par snang
K12D0494_H0462:340a-6: mdzad du phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis bsgyur te
K12D0494_H0462:340a-7: dkyil 'khor bri'o // sngags pa gsang sngags cho ga la //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-8: rtag par cho ga snga ma yis; ;phye ma dkar po blangs nas su //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-9: snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis ni //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-10: rtag tu mi g-yo dran byas te //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-11: dang por tshon rtsi dgye bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-12: de nas tshon rtsi gnyis pa ni //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-13: dmar por blangs nas dgye bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-14: tshon rtsi gsum pa ser po yang //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-15: shin tu nges par dgye bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-18: gang gis kha dog ci 'drar gsungs //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-19: de yi dkyil 'khor de nyid do //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-20: lha yi kha dog de bzhin te //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-21: zhi dang rgyas dang drag spyod pa //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-22: de yi gsang sngags de nyid 'dod //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-23: de ni gsang ba bstan pa yin //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba gang //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-25: de dag dbang chen yin par bsngags //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-26: phyag na padma'i chu yi yin //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-27: rdo rje can gyi rlung gi yin //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-28: pho nya la sogs bran rnams dang //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-29: khro bo'i ming du gang gtogs pa //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-30: kun tu thogs med gang gtogs pa //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-31: kun tu thogs med spyod pa rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-32: kun gyi dkyil 'khor me dang rlung //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-33: yang na 'di dag thams cad kyang //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-34: nus pa'i mthu ni kun dang ldan //
K12D0494_H0462:340a-35: stong pa nyid kyi bdud rtsi ngoms //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-0: @340b snying rje mig gi dri ma med //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-1: byams pa'i go cha legs par bgos //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-2: dga' ba dri ma med rtsal bral //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-3: srid pa'i rgya mtshor bying ba yi //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-4: sems can 'den par rab tu brtson //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-5: 'khor ba na yang mi gnas shing //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-6: mya ngan 'das pa'ang gnas ma yin //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-7: yang dag mtha' la nges byas shing //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-8: sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-9: de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo
K12D0494_H0462:340b-10: rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bltas nas
K12D0494_H0462:340b-11: tshig smras pa / thams cad mkhyen pa sdig bral ba //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-12: ston pa bcom par ldan pa 'dis //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-14: gtan la bab par bshad gyur pa //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-15: grogs po kun gyis mnyan par gyis //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-16: bgegs ni rnam pa du ma ste //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-17: lha dang lha min gnod sbyin mi //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-18: de la bgegs ni rnam gnyis te //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-19: phyi dang nang gi spyod yul lo //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-20: glo lud dbugs brnang rims dang skyug /
K12D0494_H0462:340b-21: skya rbab nad dang yi ga 'chus //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-22: de la sogs pa'i rims nad ni //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-23: grang rlung tsha ba la sogs las //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-24: mi bzad ngo bo can 'byung ba; ;nang gi yin par shes par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-25: phyi rol gyi ni bgegs chen rnams //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-26: mi dang de bzhin mi min te //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-27: ye shes tsher ma de dag ni //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-28: spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-30: dka' thub gnas na rmongs par byed //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-31: las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-32: de rnams slar ni bzlog par bya //
K12D0494_H0462:340b-33: tsha bar gyur nas 'ong ba'i bgegs //
K12D0494_H0462:341a-2: shes rab can gyis gnyen po yis //
K12D0494_H0462:341a-3: de dag so sor gso bar bya //
K12D0494_H0462:341a-4: yang na bgegs rnams thams cad la //
K12D0494_H0462:341a-5: sngags pas nges par mtshams bcad la; ;bgegs rnams kun la ye shes ni //
K12D0494_H0462:341a-6: zhi bar byed pa'i mchog tu bshad //
K12D0494_H0462:341a-7: 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par
K12D0494_H0462:341a-8: rdzogs par byang chub par sprul pa byin gyis rlob
K12D0494_H0462:341a-9: pa theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyal po gsang
K12D0494_H0462:341a-10: ba mchog gi rim par phye ba las /
K12D0494_H0462:341a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po byin gyis rlob pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0494_H0462:341a-12: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'i lendra po dhi dang /
